While frenzied, the ancient chimera can use its Fire Breath or Poison Spit as a bonus action during its turn, and it gains advantage on all attack rolls against creatures that don't have all their hit points. Additionally, the ancient chimera becomes immune to being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}, and it can use the Rampaging Inferno legendary action. Award the party an additional 5,000 XP (20,000 XP total) for defeating the ancient chimera after its Frenzied Onslaught trait activates.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the ancient chimera fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ancient chimera makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its horns, and one with its claws.
When its Fire Breath or Poison Spit are available, the chimera can use one of them in place of one bite attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d12 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Horns
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon head exhales fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 ({@dice 12d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Poison Spit {@recharge 5}
entries: The serpent head spits poison in a 90-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw, taking 42 ({@damage 12d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The ancient chimera makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Claws Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The ancient chimera makes one attack with its claws.

legendary.name: Rampaging Inferno (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The ancient chimera unleashes a barrage of elemental fury, using both its Fire Breath and Poison Spit as the same time, targeting the same area or different areas within range. The ancient chimera can take this action only while in a frenzied state.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the Cretan bull moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The Cretan bull has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Cretan bull makes two attacks: one with its gore and one with its hooves.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Flame Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The Cretan bull exhales a stream of fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@dice 8d6})
Fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Deadly Ambusher
entries: If the cynolycus surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage from the attack.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The cynolycus has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The cynolycus can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 18} Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The cynolycus has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the cynolycus' allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cynolycus makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Deceptive Lure
entries: The cynolycus magically mimics a sound or a voice originating from a point it can see within 120 feet of it. Any creature that investigates the sound must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check or use its movement on its next turn to move towards the sound.

reaction.name: Unnerving Dodge
entries: When a creature the cynolycus can see targets it with a melee weapon attack, the cynolycus imposes disadvantage on the attack roll, provided the cynolycus isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Eurynomos' spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Blessing of Hades
entries: The Eurynomos has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. If the Eurynomos is destroyed, its essence returns to Hades, where it completely regenerates its body in {@dice 1d10} days.

trait.name: Corpse Feaster
entries: The Eurynomos gains 20 temporary hit points whenever it kills a creature.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the Eurynomos fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Eurynomos makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws. Alternatively, the Eurynomos makes one attack with its bite and casts one spell.

action.name: Death Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) piercing damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage, and the Eurynomos regains hit points equal to half the necrotic damage dealt.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

bonus.name: Summon Shadows (1/Day)
entries: The Eurynomos summons {@dice 2d4 + 2} Shadows of Hades in unoccupied spaces within 60 feet of it.
The summoned shadows obey the Eurynomo's commands and disappear after 1 hour, when the Eurynomos dies, or if the Eurynomos dismisses them as a bonus action.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The Eurynomos moves up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Claw Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Eurynomos makes one attack with its claws.

legendary.name: Spellcasting (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The Eurynomos casts a spell.

legendary.name: Drain Life (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The Eurynomos targets one creature within 5 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The Eurynomos regains hit points equal to half the necrotic damage dealt.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The golden ram's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the golden ram moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a Ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The golden ram has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Golden Fleece
entries: The golden ram's fleece has magical properties. Any ally within 30 feet of the golden ram has advantage on all saving throws and resistance to radiant and necrotic damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golden ram makes two attacks: one with its ram and one with its hooves. Alternatively, it makes one attack with its hooves and uses its Healing Touch.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
entries: The golden ram touches another creature. The target magically regains 20 ({@dice 4d8 + 2}) hit points, and is cured of any condition affecting it.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the golden hind moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with an antlers attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Legendary Swiftness
entries: The golden hind is unaffected by difficult terrain, and spells and other magical effects can't reduce its speed. The golden hind can spend 5 feet of movement to automatically escape from nonmagical restraints.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The golden hind can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on its turn.

trait.name: Running Leap
entries: The golden hind can long jump up to 40 feet with a 10-foot running start.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golden hind makes two attacks: one with its antlers and one with its hooves. Alternatively, it makes one attack with its hooves and uses its Golden Leap.

action.name: Antlers
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Golden Leap {@recharge 5}
entries: The golden hind jumps up to 40 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Each creature within 5 feet of the landing point must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Graceful Dodge
entries: When targeted by an attack, the golden hind imposes disadvantage on the attack roll. If the attack misses, the golden hind can immediately move up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

monster.name: Golden Lion
languages: understands Common and Sylvan but can't speak

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The golden lion has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight and smell.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the golden lion fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The golden lion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The golden lion has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the lion's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the golden lion moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golden lion makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d12 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) slashing damage.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The golden lion moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Bite Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The golden lion makes one bite attack.

legendary.name: Thundering Roar (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The golden lion lets out a thundering roar. Each creature within 60 feet of the golden lion that can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The gorgon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Petrifying Gaze
entries: When a creature that can see the gorgon's eyes starts its turn within 30 ft. of the gorgon, the gorgon can force it to make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw if the gorgon isn't {@condition incapacitated} and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly petrified. Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming petrified on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or similar magic. Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the gorgon until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the gorgon in the meantime, it must immediately make the save. If the gorgon sees itself reflected on a polished surface within 30 ft. of it and in an area of bright light, the gorgon is, due to its curse, affected by its own gaze.

trait.name: Venomous Blood
entries: When the gorgon takes piercing or slashing damage, each creature within 5 feet of the gorgon takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gorgon makes either three melee attacks - one with its snake hair and two with its claws - or two ranged attacks with its longbow.

action.name: Snake Hair
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage. The target must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, taking the poison damage and being {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn on a failed save, or half as much damage and not being {@condition poisoned} on a successful one.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Summon Snakes {@recharge 5}
entries: The gorgon magically summons {@dice 1d4 + 1} giant poisonous snakes. The summoned snakes are friendly to the gorgon and obey its commands for 1 minute, until destroyed, or until the gorgon drops to 0 hit points, after which they disappear.

monster.name: Medusa

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Medusa fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Medusa has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Petrifying Gaze
entries: When a creature that can see Medusa's eyes starts its turn within 30 ft. of Medusa, she can force it to make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw if Medusa isn't {@condition incapacitated} and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly petrified.

Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming petrified on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or similar magic. Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see Medusa until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at Medusa in the meantime, it must immediately make the save. If Medusa sees herself reflected on a polished surface within 30 ft. of her and in an area of bright light, she is, due to her curse, affected by her own gaze.

trait.name: Venomous Blood
entries: When Medusa takes piercing or slashing damage, each creature within 5 feet of her takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

trait.name: Wrath of the Gorgon (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When Medusa would be reduced to 0 hit points, her current hit points instead reset to 125, and her wrath is unleashed, granting her resistance to all damage for 1 hour. During this time her ability to petrify creatures is enhanced, causing all saving throws against her Petrifying Gaze to be made with disadvantage. Additionally, Medusa can now use the options in the {@b Mythic Actions} section for 1 hour.
Award the party an additional 18,000 (36,000 XP total) for defeating Medusa after her Wrath of the Gorgon trait activates.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Medusa makes three attacks: one with her claws, one to constrict, and one with her snake hair.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). Until this grapple ends, the target is also {@condition restrained} and takes 15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns, and Medusa can't constrict another target.

action.name: Snake Hair
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) piercing damage plus 31 ({@damage 9d6}) poison damage.

bonus.name: Summon Snakes {@recharge 4}
entries: Medusa magically summons {@dice 1d4 + 1} giant poisonous snakes. The summoned snakes are friendly to Medusa and obey her commands for 1 minute, until destroyed, or until Medusa drops to 0 hit points, after which they disappear.

reaction.name: Slithering Escape
entries: When Medusa takes damage, she moves up to half her movement speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Medusa moves up to her speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Constrict (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Medusa makes one constrict attack.

legendary.name: Snake Hair Attack (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Medusa makes one snake hair attack.

mythicHeader: If Medusa's Wrath of the Gorgon trait has activated in the last hour, she can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Deadly Allure (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Medusa uses her charm to beguile a creature she can see within 30 feet of her. The target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by Medusa for 1 minute. While {@condition charmed} in this way, the creature is compelled to move towards Medusa and cannot avert its gaze.

mythic.name: Serpentine Whirlwind (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Medusa's snake hair lashes out in a deadly whirlwind. Each creature within 10 feet of her must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) slashing damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The harpy's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The harpy doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Keen Instincts
entries: The harpy can't be surprised, and it has advantage on initiative rolls.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The harpy makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its dagger. Alternatively, it makes one attack with its claws and casts one spell.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Luring Song
entries: The harpy sings a magical melody. Every humanoid and giant within 300 ft. of the harpy that can hear the song must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the song ends. The harpy must take a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue singing. It can stop singing at any time. The song ends if the harpy is {@condition incapacitated}. While {@condition charmed} by the harpy, a target is {@condition incapacitated} and ignores the songs of other harpies. If the {@condition charmed} target is more than 5 ft. away from the harpy, the creature must move on its turn toward the harpy by the most direct route. It doesn't avoid opportunity attacks, but before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit, and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the harpy, a target can repeat the saving throw. A creature can also repeat the saving throw with disadvantage at the end of each of its turns. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the effect ends on it. A target that successfully saves is immune to this harpy's song for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Winds of Fury {@recharge 4}
entries: The harpy whips its wing around itself. Any creature within 30 feet of the harpy must make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) slashing damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

All creatures other than the Hecatoncheires within a 60-foot radius centered on it must make a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 ({@damage 12d8}) bludgeoning damage and being knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or half as much damage and not being knocked {@condition prone} on a successful one.

entries: The eleionomae can move across difficult terrain created by swamps, mud, or shallow water without expending extra movement.

trait.name: Shapeshifter
entries: As an action, the eleionomae magically transforms into the form of a beast or a humanoid that she has seen before. Her statistics, other than her size, are the same in each form. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. The eleionomae reverts to her true form if she dies or falls {@condition unconscious}, or if she dismisses the transformation as a bonus action on her turn.

trait.name: Swamp Camouflage
entries: The eleionomae has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

trait.name: Swamp Regeneration
entries: The eleionomae regains 5 hit points if she is in contact with water or swampy surfaces.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The eleionomae makes two quarterstaff attacks. She can replace one quarterstaff attack to cast a spell or use her swamp grasp.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit ({@hit 7} to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.

action.name: Swamp Grasp
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by entangling plants and vines until the start of the eleionomae's next turn.

reaction.name: Thorny Vines
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the eleionomae hits her with an attack, the eleionomae deals 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage to the attacker.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hamadryad's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The hamadryad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
entries: The hamadryad can speak with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

trait.name: Tree Stride
entries: Once on her turn, the hamadryad can use 10 feet of movement to step magically into one living tree within her reach and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

action.name: Whip of Vines
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Enthralling Beauty
entries: The hamadryad targets one humanoid she can see within 30 feet of her. If the target can see the hamadryad, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be {@condition charmed}. The {@condition charmed} target regards the hamadryad as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the hamadryad's control, it takes the hamadryad's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can. Each time the hamadryad or the hamadryad's allies do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the hamadryad dies, is on a different plane of existence from the target, or ends the effect as a bonus action. If a target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the hamadryad's Enthralling Beauty for the next 24 hours. The hamadryad can have no more than two humanoids and up to six beasts {@condition charmed} at any time.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The oceanid's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). The Oceanid can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Ocean's Command
entries: The oceanid can communicate with sea creatures, understand their emotions and control them.

trait.name: Poseidon Blessing
entries: The oceanid can breathe air and water.
While in water, it has advantage on all attack rolls and saving throws.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The maenad makes three watery grasp attacks.

action.name: Watery Grasp
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5ft., or range 60 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} until the start of the oceanid's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The maenad's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). The maenad can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Frenzied Dance
entries: When the maenad takes damage, she enters a frenzied state until the end of her next turn. While frenzied, the maenad gains advantage on melee weapon attack rolls and Strength ability checks and saving throws, and she has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The maenad makes two thyrsus staff attacks.
She can replace one attack to cast a spell with her Innate Spellcasting trait.

action.name: Thyrsus Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hesperis' innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 21}). The hesperis can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Blessing of the Garden
entries: The hesperis has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. If the hesperis is destroyed, her essence returns to the Garden of the Hesperides, where it completely regenerates her body in {@dice 1d10} days.

trait.name: Divine Weapons
entries: The hesperis' weapon attacks are magical and deal an additional 21 ({@damage 6d6}) radiant damage (already included in the attack).

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the hesperis fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hesperis can make two celestial weapon attacks. She can replace one attack to cast a spell instead.

action.name: Celestial Weapon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d12 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Radiant Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: The hesperis unleashes a blast of radiant energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw, taking 42 ({@damage 12d6}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The hesperis moves up to half her movement speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Celestial Weapon Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The hesperis makes one celestial weapon attack.

legendary.name: Radiant Burst (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The hesperis releases a burst of radiant energy in a 20-foot radius centered on itself.

Each creature in that area other than the hesperis must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) radiant damage and being {@condition blinded} until the start of the hesperis' next turn on a failed save, or half and as much damage and not being {@condition blinded} on a successful one.

legendary.name: Healing Radiance (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The hesperis emits a radiant aura targeting up to 6 friendly creatures within 30 feet of her. Each creature regains 20 ({@dice 3d8 + 7}) hit points.

trait.name: Heroic Aura
entries: The Olympian hero emits an aura of confidence and bravery. Friendly creatures within 30 feet of it gain a +1 bonus to their AC (already included in the hero's statblock) and are immune to being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Olympian hero makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Inspire Courage
entries: The Olympian Hero can inspire an ally it can see within 30 feet of it, granting advantage on the next attack roll or saving throw it makes in the next minute.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The Olympian hero adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the hero must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Heroic Aura
entries: The Olympian hero emits an aura of confidence and bravery. Friendly creatures within 30 feet of it gain a +2 bonus to their AC (already included in the hero's statblock) and are immune to being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the Olympian Hero fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The Olympian hero has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The Olympian Hero's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Olympian Hero makes three weapon attacks, or uses its Cleave and makes one melee weapon attack.

action.name: +1 Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: +1 Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d6 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: +1 Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Cleave {@recharge 5}
entries: The Olympian Hero makes a melee weapon attack against each creature within 5 feet of it.

bonus.name: Inspire Valor
entries: The Olympian Hero can inspire an ally it can see within 30 feet of it, granting the ally advantage on the next attack roll or saving throw it makes in the next hour.

reaction.name: Heroic Retaliation
entries: The Olympian hero adds 5 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the hero must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon. If the attack misses, the Olympian hero can make a melee weapon attack against the attacking creature.

monster.name: Mythic Olympian Hero

trait.name: Divine Favor of Olympus (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the Olympian Hero would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit points instead reset to 145, it regains one expended one use of Legendary Resistance, and it is enveloped in a radiant aura that grants it resistance to all damage and increases its movement speed by 20 feet for 1 hour. Additionally, the Olympian hero can now use the options in the {@b Mythic Actions} section for 1 hour.
Award the party an additional 13,000 XP (26,000 XP total) for defeating the Olympian hero after its Divine Favor of Olympus trait activates.

trait.name: Heroic Aura
entries: The Olympian hero emits an aura of confidence and bravery. Friendly creatures within 30 feet of it gain a +3 bonus to their AC (already included in the hero's statblock) and are immune to being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Indomitable Will
entries: The Olympian hero has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. If the hero rolls a 20 for the save of a spell that targets only it, the spell has no effect on it and instead targets the caster, using the slot level, spell save DC, attack bonus, and spellcasting ability of the caster.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Olympian hero fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The Olympian hero's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Olympian Blessing
entries: A weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the Olympian hero hits with it (already included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Olympian hero makes three weapon attacks, or uses its cleave and makes one melee weapon attack.

action.name: +1 Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) slashing damage, or 19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) slashing damage if wielded with two hands.

action.name: +1 Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: +1 Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Cleave {@recharge 5}
entries: The Olympian hero makes a melee weapon attack against each creature within 5 feet of it.

bonus.name: Inspire Valor
entries: The Olympian hero can inspire an ally it can see within 30 feet of it, granting the ally advantage on the next attack roll or saving throw it makes in the next hour.

reaction.name: Mythic Retaliation
entries: The Olympian hero adds 5 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the hero must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon. If the attack misses, the Olympian hero can make a melee weapon attack against the attacking creature with advantage on the attack roll.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The Olympian hero moves up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The Olympian hero makes one weapon attack.

legendary.name: Inspire Valor (Costs 2 Action)
entries: The Olympian hero uses its Inspire Valor.

legendary.name: Heroic Charge (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Olympian hero moves up to its speed towards an enemy it can see and makes a melee weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll.

legendary.name: Cleave (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The Olympian hero uses its Cleave.

mythicHeader: If the Olympian hero's Divine Favor of Olympus trait has activated in the last hour, it can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Thunderstrike (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Olympian hero calls down a mighty thunderstrike and throws it in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

mythic.name: Indomitable Fortitude (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Olympian hero fortifies its resolve, automatically succeeding on the first saving throw it makes until the start of its next turn.

mythic.name: Heroic Leap (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Olympian hero magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet of it, unleashing a shockwave upon arrival. Each creature within 10 feet of the Olympian hero must make a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw, taking 13 ({@damage 3d8}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

mythic.name: Shield of Valor (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The Olympian hero raises its shield, gaining a +2 bonus to its AC until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The ophiotaurus can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Bullish Endurance
entries: If damage reduces the ophiotaurus to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is from a critical hit. On a success, the ophiotaurus drops to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the ophiotaurus moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The ophiotaurus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Mythical Presence
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the ophiotaurus must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The ophiotaurus regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and is in contact with water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ophiotaurus makes two attacks: one with its gore and one with its tail.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d12 + 6}) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 5 feet away from the ophiotaurus and knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Vengeful Strike
entries: When the ophiotaurus takes damage from a creature within 10 feet of it, it makes a tail attack against that creature.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Oracle's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks).
The Oracle can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Divine Insight
entries: The Oracle has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) checks to divine the future or understand omens.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the Oracle of Delphi fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Divine Revelation
entries: The Oracle of Delphi imparts a cryptic but crucial piece of information about a creature she can see within 60 feet. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or all creatures gain advantage on attack rolls made against it for 1 minute.

action.name: Divine Intervention (1/Day)
entries: The Oracle of Delphi asks for divine intervention, rolling a {@dice d100} and succeeding on a roll of 15 or lower. The DM chooses the nature of the divine intervention that occurs on a success.

reaction.name: Prophetic Warning
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the Oracle of Delphi is targeted by an attack or ability, the Oracle can impose disadvantage on the attack roll or give the target advantage on the saving throw.

legendary.name: At Will Spell
entries: The Oracle casts one at will spell.

legendary.name: Spellcasting (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Oracle casts a spell. 71 Greek Mythology

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The satyr's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks).
The satyr can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the satyr moves at least 10 feet in a straight line toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The satyr's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks).
The satyr lord can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the satyr lord moves at least 10 feet in a straight line toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The satyr lord makes two attacks: one with its longsword and one with its horns.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Nimble Dodge
entries: When an attacker that the satyr lord can see hits it with an attack, the satyr uses its reaction to halve the attack's damage against it.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The satyr's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks).
The satyr elder can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the satyr elder moves at least 10 feet in a straight line toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The satyr elder makes two attacks: one with its quarterstaff and one with its horns.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Nimble Dodge
entries: When an attacker that the satyr elder can see hits it with an attack, the satyr uses its reaction to halve the attack's damage against it.

monster.name: Shade of Hades
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Shadow Form
entries: The shade can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object. The shade can also take the Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Withering Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 8} Constitution saving throw or suffer one level of {@condition exhaustion}.

monster.name: Shade of Tartarus
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Shadow Form
entries: The shade can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object. The shade can also take the Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Withering Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or suffer one level of {@condition exhaustion}.

action.name: Wail of Tartarus (1/Day)
entries: The shade releases a wail from the depths of Tartarus. All creatures within 60 feet of it that can hear it must make a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature is {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. At the start of each of its turns, a creature {@condition stunned} in this way suffers one level of {@condition exhaustion}. A {@condition stunned} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself as a success.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The siren can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The siren makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Siren's Call {@recharge 5}
entries: The siren sings a haunting melody. Each creature within 300 feet that can hear the song must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the melody ends. The siren must take a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue singing. It can stop singing at any time. The song ends if the siren is {@condition incapacitated}. While {@condition charmed} by the siren, a target is {@condition incapacitated} and ignores the songs of other sirens. If the {@condition charmed} target is more than 5 ft. away from the siren, they must move on its turn toward the siren by the most direct route. It doesn't avoid opportunity attacks, but before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit, and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the siren, a target can repeat the saving throw. A creature can also repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns.
If a creature's saving throw is successful, the effect ends on it. A target that successfully saves is immune to this siren's song for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Enchanting Gaze
entries: When a creature that can see the siren's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of the siren, the siren can force the creature to make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw if the siren isn't {@condition incapacitated} and can see the creature. On a fail, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the siren for 1 minute. A {@condition charmed} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The spartoi warrior is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The spartoi warrior has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the spartoi warrior can deal an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the spartoi warrior that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Unyielding
entries: If damage reduces the spartoi warrior to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is from a critical hit. On a success, the spartoi drops to 1 hit point instead and immediately makes one melee weapon attack.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The spartoi warrior doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spartoi warrior makes three weapon attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Retaliation
entries: The spartoi warrior adds 5 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the spartoi must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon. If the attack misses, the spartoi warrior can make a melee weapon attack against the attacking creature as part of the same reaction.

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the Stymphalian bird is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a talon attack on the same turn, the attack deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage to the target.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The Stymphalian bird doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The Stymphalian bird has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of its allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Stymphalian bird makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Razor Feathers {@recharge}
entries: The Stymphalian bird unleashes a volley of razor-sharp feathers in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Tarandos
languages: understands Common and Sylvan but can't speak

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The tarandos' innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks).
The tarandos can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the tarandos moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with an antlers attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Illuminating Antlers
entries: The tarandos emits bright light in a 20- foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. This light is magical, can dispel areas of magical darkness, and can't be dispelled by any means short of a {@spell wish} spell.

trait.name: Nature's Ally
entries: The tarandos can communicate with and command other animals within a 1-mile radius.

trait.name: Regal Presence
entries: Creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against the tarandon, unless the tarandon has attacked them or targeted them with a harmful spell or effect within the last hour.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tarandos makes two attacks: one with its antlers and one with its hooves.

action.name: Antlers
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

bonus.name: Beckon
entries: The tarandos can target one {@condition charmed} creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must use its reaction, if available, to move up to its speed toward the tarandos.

reaction.name: Mesmerizing Gaze
entries: When the tarandos is hit by an attack, it can attempt to charm the attacker. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the Minotaur moves at least 10 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Frenzied Rampage (Recharges after a Short or a Long Rest)
entries: When the Minotaur is reduced to or below 106 hit points, it enters a frenzied state for 1 hour. While frenzied, the Minotaur can make an additional attack with its gore as part of its Multiattack action, and it gains advantage on all Strength ability checks and saving throws. Additionally, the Minotaur becomes immune to being {@condition stunned} and {@condition paralyzed}, and it can use the Raging Bull legendary action.

trait.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: The Minotaur can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Minotaur fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the Minotaur can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Minotaur makes three attacks: two with its greataxe and one with its gore.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The Minotaur moves up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Minotaur makes one attack with its greataxe or with its gore.

legendary.name: Maze of Fear (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The Minotaur imposes an overwhelming sense of dread and disorientation on all creatures of its choice within 60 feet of it. Each targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary.name: Raging Bull (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The minotaur charges in a straight line up to 50 feet. Each creature in its path must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes half damage and is not knocked {@condition prone}. The Minotaur can take this action only while in a frenzied state.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The triton can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Emissary of the Sea
entries: The triton can communicate simple ideas with beasts that can breathe water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The triton makes two attacks with its trident.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if wielded with two hands.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The triton spellslinger's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The triton can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Emissary of the Sea
entries: The triton can communicate simple ideas with beasts that can breathe water.

action.name: Trident of the Depths
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage.

action.name: Summon Water Hippocampus (1/Day)
entries: The triton magically conjures a water hippocampus (as detailed below), which appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the triton.
The hippocampus is friendly to the triton and obeys its spoken commands. It remains for 1 hour or until it is reduced to 0 hit points, and it acts on its own initiative.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The triton can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Emissary of the Sea
entries: The triton can communicate simple ideas with beasts that can breathe water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The triton makes three attacks with its trident of the depths.

action.name: Trident of the Depths
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage.

bonus.name: Shield Bash
entries: The triton attempts to shove a Large or smaller creature within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Retaliation
entries: The triton adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the triton must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon. If the attack misses, the triton can make a melee weapon attack against the attacking creature as part of the same reaction.

trait.name: Water Form
entries: The hippocampus can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Aquatic Surge {@recharge 4}
entries: The hippocampus moves up to its swim speed in a straight line. Each creature the hippocampus moves through must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The triton tidalmender is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). The triton has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The triton can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Emissary of the Sea
entries: The triton can communicate simple ideas with beasts that can breathe water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The triton makes two attacks with its trident of the depths. Alternatively, it makes one attack with its trident and casts one spell with its Spellcasting trait.

action.name: Trident of the Depths
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage.

action.name: Tidal Touch (3/Day)
entries: The triton tidalmender touches another creature. The target magically regains 20 ({@dice 4d8 + 2}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness. The target also gains a swimming speed of 30 feet and the ability to breath air and water for 24 hours.

action.name: Summon Water Hippocampus {@recharge 5}
entries: The triton tidalmender magically conjures a water hippocampus, which appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the triton. The hippocampus is friendly to the triton and obeys its spoken commands. It remains for 1 hour or until it is reduced to 0 hit points, and it acts on its own initiative. The triton can have a maximum of three water hippocampi conjured at any time.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The triton can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the triton monarch fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Poseidon Blessing
entries: The triton monarch has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
Additionally, the triton regenerates 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it is submerged in water and it has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Royal Presence
entries: Friendly creatures within 30 feet of the triton monarch have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}. Hostile creatures within the same radius have disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws.

trait.name: Ruler of the Sea
entries: The triton can communicate telepathically out to a range of 60 feet with beasts that can breathe water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The triton monarch makes three attacks with its trident of the depths and uses its Royal Command.

action.name: +1 Trident of the Depths
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d10 + 7}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) cold damage.

action.name: Royal Command {@recharge 4}
entries: The triton monarch speaks a one-word command to a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or follow the triton's command on its next turn (as per the {@spell command} spell).

bonus.name: Shield Bash
entries: The triton attempts to shove a Large or smaller creature within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Retaliation
entries: The triton adds 5 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the triton must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon. If the attack misses, the triton can make a melee weapon attack against the attacking creature as part of the same reaction.

monster.name: Triton

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Triton is a 20th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 24}, {@hit 16} to hit with spell attacks). Triton has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: Triton knows if he hears a lie.

trait.name: God of the Sea
entries: Triton can communicate telepathically out to a range of 1 mile with beasts that can breathe water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Triton fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Ocean's Swiftness
entries: Triton can breathe air and water and he can move across difficult terrain created by swamps, mud, or shallow water without expending extra movement.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If Triton is destroyed, his essence returns to Mount Olympus, where he completely regenerates his body in {@dice 1d10} days.

trait.name: Son of Poseidon
entries: Triton has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. Additionally, Triton regenerates 20 hit points at the start of his turn if he is submerged in water and he has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Sovereign Presence
entries: Friendly creatures within 60 feet of Triton are immune to being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}. Hostile creatures within the same radius have disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws.

trait.name: Tidal Resurgence (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When Triton would be reduced to 0 hit points, his current hit points instead reset to 145, he regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance, and he harnesses the power of the ocean, allowing him to move without provoking opportunity attacks for 1 hour. Additionally, Triton regains one expended use of Legendary Resistance. Furthermore, Triton can now use the options in the {@b Mythic Actions} section for 1 hour.
Award the party an additional 41,000 XP (82,000 XP total) for defeating Triton after his Tidal Resurgence trait activates.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Triton makes three attacks with his trident of the depths. Alternatively, he makes two attacks with his trident and casts one spell with his Spellcasting trait.

action.name: +2 Golden Trident of the Depths
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) piercing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) lightning damage.

bonus.name: Whirlpool {@recharge 4}
entries: Triton creates a whirlpool in a 20- foot radius centered on a point it can see within 60 feet.
Creatures within the whirlpool must make a {@dc 24} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 10 feet towards its center and be {@condition restrained} until the end of their next turn.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Triton moves up to half his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: Triton makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Trident Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Triton makes one attack with his trident.

legendary.name: Poseidon's Wrath (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Triton unleashes a storm of vengeance around himself. Each creature within 60 feet must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 5d10}) cold damage and 27 ({@damage 5d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

mythicHeader: If Triton's Tidal Resurgence trait has activated in the last hour, he can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Acquatic Surge (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Triton moves up to half his movement speed towards an enemy he can see and then makes one trident attack.

mythic.name: Spellcasting (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Triton casts a spell up to 7th level with his Spellcasting trait.

mythic.name: Healing Wave (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Triton calls upon the healing powers of the ocean, restoring 27 ({@dice 4d8 + 9}) hit points to all creatures of his choice within 60 feet of him.

monster.name: Typhon, Father of all Monsters

trait.name: Eldritch Cataclysm (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Typhon would be reduced to 0 hit points, his current hit points instead reset to 475, he regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance, and he recharges his Dreadful Roar. Additionally, Typhon can now use the options in the {@b Mythic Actions} section for 1 hour. Award a party an additional 155,000 XP (310,000 XP total) for defeating Typhon after his Eldritch Cataclysm activates.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If Typhon fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Typhon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Siege Abomination
entries: Typhon deals triple damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Typhon can use his Frightful Presence. He then makes three attacks: one with his bite, one with his claw, and one with his tail slam.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d10 + 10}) piercing damage plus 27 ({@dice 6d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 3d12 + 10}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d10 + 10}) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 27} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of Typhon's choice that is within 120 feet of him and aware of him must succeed on a {@dc 26} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. Whenever a creature {@condition frightened} in this way makes an attack roll or a saving throw, it must roll a {@dice d6} and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll or saving throw. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Typhon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Dreadful Roar {@recharge 5}
entries: Typhon emits a terrifying roar.
Each creature within 60 feet of Typhon must succeed on a {@dc 26} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: Typhon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Claw Attack
entries: Typhon makes one claw attack.

legendary.name: Abyssal Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Typhon vanishes and immediately reappears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of his previous location. Each creature within a 20-foot radius of Typhon's arrival point must succeed on a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) force damage as the fabric of reality strains and distorts around his entry.

legendary.name: Cataclysmic Slam (Costs 3 actions)
entries: Typhon slams the ground with immense force. Each creature within 10 feet of him must succeed on a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw or take 27 ({@damage 3d10 + 10}) force damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Dreadful Roar (Costs 5 Actions)
entries: Typhon immediately uses his Dreadful Roar.

mythicHeader: If Typhon's Eldritch Cataclysm trait has activated in the last hour, he can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Bite Attack
entries: Typhon makes one bite attack.

mythic.name: Tail Smash (Costs 2 actions)
entries: Typhon slams his tail against all creatures in a 30-foot cone. Each creature within that area must succeed on a {@dc 27} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and take 26 ({@damage 3d10 + 10}) bludgeoning damage.

mythic.name: Rend Reality (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Typhon rends the fabric of reality. He makes one bite attack and one claw attack against a single target, ignoring any resistances or immunities to his damage.

mythic.name: Eldritch Annihilation (Costs 5 Actions)
entries: Typhon taps into the primordial chaos, channeling unfathomable energies through his monstrous form. He releases a cataclysmic burst of eldritch power in a 60-foot radius originating from himself. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 27} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 66 ({@damage 12d10}) force damage, 66 ({@damage 12d10}) necrotic damage, and is pushed 30 feet away from Typhon, knocked {@condition prone}, and {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half damage and isn't {@condition stunned} or knocked {@condition prone}. The very ground cracks and warps under the strain of this attack, becoming difficult terrain for every creature other than Typhon for the next minute.

trait.name: Aquatic
entries: The Amikiri can breathe underwater and move through water without impediment.

trait.name: Mesh-Cutter
entries: Whenever the Amikiri makes a successful attack against a net or a creature wearing a net or similar fabric-based armor, it deals an additional 5 ({@damage 1d10}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The Amikiri can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Water Jet {@recharge 5}
entries: The Amikiri releases a highpressure jet of water from its tail in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is also pushed up to 10 feet away from the Amikiri on a failed save.

bonus.name: Evasive Maneuver
entries: The Amikiri moves 5 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The asura's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). The asura can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:

trait.name: Aura of Fury
entries: The asura emits an aura of anger and aggression. When an hostile creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the asura, it must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on its next attack roll.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The asura has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Reactive
entries: The asura can take one reaction on every turn in a combat.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The asura makes six attacks: two with its longsword and four with its palm.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Palm
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Heavenly Burst {@recharge 5}
entries: The asura releases a burst of radiant energy in a 20-foot radius sphere centered on itself.
Each creature in that area other than the asura must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

reaction.name: Sublime Retaliation
entries: Whenever a creature makes an attack against the asura and misses it by 5 or more, the asura can use its reaction to make an attack with its palm against the attacking creature.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The asura's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 21}, {@hit 13} to hit with spell attacks). The asura can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:

trait.name: Aura of Wrath
entries: The asura emits an aura of wrath. When an hostile creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the asura, it must make a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage and have disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The asura has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Reactive
entries: The asura can take one reaction on every turn in a combat.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The asura makes six attacks: one with its glaive and five with its fists.

action.name: Blazing Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 1d12 + 9}) slashing damage plus 9 ({@dice 2d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Massive Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 1d10 + 9}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Radiant Eruption {@recharge 5}
entries: The asura releases a burst of radiant energy in a 30-foot radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area other than the asura must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw, taking 66 ({@damage 12d10}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

reaction.name: Divine Retaliation
entries: When a creature makes an attack against the asura and doesn't hit, the asura makes a fist attack against the attacking creature.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The asura's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 22}, {@hit 14} to hit with spell attacks). The asura can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:

trait.name: Aura of Serenity
entries: All creatures within 60 feet of the asura have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened} or {@condition charmed}. Allied creatures within the aura also gain 10 temporary hit points at the start of their turns.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The asura has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Reactive
entries: The asura can take one reaction on every turn in a combat.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The asura makes three attacks with its staff.

action.name: Staff of Serenity
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the asura for 1 minute.

action.name: Heavenly Light {@recharge 5}
entries: The asura calls down a column of holy light in a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within 120 feet. Each creature within that area must make a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw, taking 52 ({@damage 8d12}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Undead and fiends have disadvantage on this saving throw.

reaction.name: Divine Shield
entries: When a creature the asura can see within 60 feet of it targets a creature other than the asura, the asura creates a shield of divine light to protect that target. The target gains a +5 bonus to AC until the start of the asura's next turn.

monster.name: Azure Dragon

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dragon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 26}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Divine Descent (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the dragon would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit points instead reset to 600, it recharges its Divine Breath, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the dragon can now use the options in the {@b Mythic Actions} section for 1 hour.
Award a party an additional 155,000 XP (310,000 XP total) for defeating the dragon after its Divine Descent trait activates.

trait.name: Divine Presence
entries: The dragon sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius. Any hostile or evil-aligned creature that starts its turn in this light must make a {@dc 26} Constitution saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. This light dispels darkness and magical darkness within the area.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The dragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The dragon's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d10 + 10}) piercing damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 25 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 27} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 27} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute.
