A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Divine Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales a divine breath in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 99 ({@damage 18d10}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Evil-aligned creatures have disadvantage on this saving throw.

legendary.name: Claw Attack
entries: The dragon makes one claw attack.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon harnesses its mastery over space, instantly disappearing from its current location and reappearing in an unoccupied space of its choice within 120 feet.

legendary.name: Divine Radiance (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon emanates a radiant aura, filling a 20-foot radius sphere centered on itself with divine light. Each creature within the aura must make a {@dc 26} Constitution saving throw or take 36 ({@damage 8d8}) radiant damage and become {@condition blinded} until the end of their next turn. Evil-aligned creatures have disadvantage on this saving throw.

legendary.name: Radiant Burst (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The dragon releases a burst of radiant energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 72 ({@damage 16d8}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

mythicHeader: If the dragon's Divine Descent trait has activated in the last hour, it can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Attack
entries: The dragon makes one bite or tail attack.

mythic.name: Healing Radiance (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon regains 36 ({@dice 6d8 + 9}) hit points.

mythic.name: Divine Gaze (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The dragon targets a creature within 60 feet. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 26} Wisdom saving throw or take 36 ({@damage 8d8}) psychic damage and become {@condition frightened}. While {@condition frightened} in this way, the creature takes 36 ({@damage 8d8}) psychic damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Aqueous Stealth
entries: The baak has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks while submerged in water.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The baak can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Drowning Grasp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature and within 5 feet of a body of water or underwater, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled} and pulled underwater by the baak.

action.name: Possession (3/Day)
entries: One humanoid that the baak can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the baak. The baak then disappears, and the target is {@condition incapacitated} and loses control of its body. The baak now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The baak can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.
The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the baak ends it as a bonus action, or the baak is turned or forced out by an effect like the {@spell dispel evil and good} spell.

When the possession ends, the baak reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 ft. of the body. The target is immune to this baak's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

reaction.name: Frightful Appearance
entries: When a creature that can see the baak starts its turn within 30 feet of it, the baak creates a terrifying illusion. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute.
The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The bakeneko's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). The bakeneko can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the bakeneko is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The bakeneko can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, don't change. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bakeneko makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) slashing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage.

bonus.name: Terrifying Gaze
entries: The bakeneko targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the bakeneko, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Baku's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}). The Baku can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Dream Walker
entries: The Baku can enter the dreams of sleeping creatures, engaging in combat or interaction within the dream itself. While in a dream, it is immune to damage from outside sources. Additionally, the Baku can choose up to 10 willing creatures it can see within 30 feet before entering the dream. These allies are then transported into the dream with the Baku and can interact within it as if they were in the creature's dream. Allies brought into the dream by the Baku can only be harmed by dream manifestations, and any damage taken is non-lethal, waking up the injured ally.

trait.name: Soporific Aura
entries: The Baku exudes a calming aura in a 10-foot radius. Any hostile creature that starts its turn in this aura must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become drowsy, suffering disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the start of the creature's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Baku makes two attacks: one with its trunk and one with its stomp.

action.name: Trunk
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Dream Dust
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute. The target awakens if it takes damage or if another creature uses its action to shake the target awake.

bonus.name: Dream Eater
entries: The Baku can consumes nightmare from a sleeping creature it can see within 10 feet of it. When it does so, the creature has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened} for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Fiery Retaliation
entries: A creature that touches or hits the Basan with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it for the first time in a turn takes 5 ({@dice 2d4}) fire damage.

trait.name: Nocturnal Feeder
entries: The Basan is most active at night. It has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks in dim light or darkness.

action.name: Peck
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge}
entries: The Basan exhales a blast of force energy in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@dice 4d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dokkaebi's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). The dokkaebi can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Dokkaebi Fire
entries: The dokkaebi conjures a series of small blue flames around itself in a radius of 20 feet that last until the start of its next turn. Creatures that start their turn within 5 feet of the flames must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@dice 1d8 + 3}) fire damage.

action.name: Trickster's Mischief
entries: The dokkaebi weaves illusions within a 10-foot radius area within 30 feet of it. Each creature within the area must succeed on a {@dc 12} Intelligence saving throw or be distracted by the illusion, imposing disadvantage on all attack rolls and saving throws until the end of its next turn.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dokkaebi's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). The dokkaebi can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Charm Arrow
entries: The dokkaebi fires a magical arrow at a creature it can see within 60 feet. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the dokkaebi for 1 minute.

action.name: Dokkaebi Fire
entries: The dokkaebi conjures a series of small blue flames around itself in a radius of 20 feet that last until the start of its next turn. Creatures that start their turn within 5 feet of the flames must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 12 ({@dice 2d8 + 3}) fire damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dokkaebi's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). The dokkaebi can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Charm Arrow
entries: The dokkaebi fires a magical arrow at a creature it can see within 60 feet. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the dokkaebi for 1 minute.

action.name: Dokkaebi Fire
entries: The dokkaebi conjures a series of small blue flames around itself in a radius of 20 feet that last until the start of its next turn. Creatures that start their turn within 5 feet of the flames must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 21 ({@dice 4d8 + 3}) fire damage.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The dokkaebi makes one attack with its quarterstaff.

legendary.name: Cast Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dokkaebi casts a spell with its Innate Spellcasting trait.

legendary.name: Spawn Dokkaebi (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The dokkaebi summons another dokkaebi to aid it in battle. To determine the type of dokkaebi summoned, roll a {@dice d100} and refer to the table below.

The summoned creature appears in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of the dokkaebi arcanist and acts on its own initiative. It is friendly towards the summoner and obeys its commands for 1 minute, after which it vanishes.

trait.name: Echoing Presence
entries: The gandharva leaves behind a faint echo of its presence, granting it advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide.

trait.name: Magical Weapon
entries: The gandharva weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dancing Steps
entries: The gandharva magically moves up to half its speed without expending its movement. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

action.name: Song of Healing (3/Day)
entries: The gandharva sings a rejuvenating melody to restore 3 ({@dice 1d6}) hit points to a creature it touches.
The creature also gains advantage on the next saving throw during the next minute.

action.name: Soothing Melody
entries: The gandharva sings a soothing melody.

Each creature of the gandharva's choice within 30 feet of it that can hear the melody must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} for 1 minute. If the {@condition charmed} creature takes damage, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus.name: Dance of Inspiration
entries: The gandharva performs a graceful dance that inspires up to two creatures of its choice within 30 feet. The inspired creatures gain a {@dice d8} inspiration die.

Once within the next 10 minutes, an inspired creature can roll the die and add the number rolled to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw it makes. The creature can wait until after it rolls the {@dice d20} before deciding to use the inspiration die, but must decide before knowing whether the roll succeeds or fails. A creature can have only one inspiration die at a time.

bonus.name: Countercharm
entries: The gandharva plays a countercharm melody. Creatures within 30 feet of the gandharva that can hear the melody have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened} and {@condition charmed} until the start of the gandharva's next turn.

monster.name: Garuda

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Garuda's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 24}). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Blessed by the Wind
entries: Garuda's affinity with the air allows him to harness its swiftness. Garuda can use two bonus actions during his turn.

trait.name: Eagle-Eyed Guardian
entries: Garuda can discern the intentions of creatures within his line of sight, granting him advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) checks to detect lies or hidden motives.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Garuda fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Garuda has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Vishnu's Blessing (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Garuda would be reduced to 0 hit points, his current hit points instead reset to 245, he recharges his Wind Burst, and he regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, Garuda can now use the options in the {@b Mythic Actions} section for 1 hour.
Award a party an additional 62,000 XP (124,000 XP total) for defeating Garuda after his Vishnu's Blessing trait activates.

trait.name: Wind Attacks
entries: Garuda's weapon attacks are magical. When Garuda deals slashing damage, he ignores resistances and treats immunities as resistances.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Garuda makes three attacks: one with his beak and two with his talons.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 2d12 + 10}) piercing damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Wind Burst {@recharge 5}
entries: Garuda emits a wind burst in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 25} Dexterity saving throw, taking 88 ({@damage 16d10}) slashing damage and being knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or half as much damage and not being knocked {@condition prone} on a successful one.

bonus.name: Air Domain
entries: Garuda summons a powerful wind within a 30- foot radius, creating temporary difficult terrain until the end of his next turn for every creature in the area except himself.

bonus.name: Wind Mark
entries: Garuda bestows a wind mark on an ally within 60 feet of himself. The marked creature gains a +5 bonus to all its Dexterity-based ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of Garuda's next turn.

bonus.name: Swift Dodge
entries: Garuda nimbly evades incoming attacks. The next attack targeting Garuda has disadvantage on the attack roll.

reaction.name: Predator
entries: When a hostile creature that Garuda can see moves out of its reach, Garuda makes one attack with its beak and one with its talons.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Garuda moves up to half his speed.

legendary.name: Talon Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Garuda makes one talons attack.

legendary.name: Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Garuda casts a spell.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Garuda harnesses his mastery over space, instantly disappearing from his current location and reappearing in an unoccupied space of his choice within 120 feet.

legendary.name: Wind Burst (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Garuda uses his Wind Burst.

mythicHeader: If Garuda's Vishnu's Blessing trait has activated in the last hour, he can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Beak Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Garuda makes one beak attack.

mythic.name: Heavenly Flight (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Garuda soars 60 ft. up into the sky without provoking opportunity attacks, gaining resistant to all damage until the start of his next turn.

mythic.name: Celestial Roar
entries: (Costs 4 Actions) Garuda emits a thunderous roar that can be heard up to 1 mile away. All creatures of Garuda's choice within 1 mile of him regain 60 hit points, and all enemies within 1 mile must succeed on a {@dc 25} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monster.name: Gashadokuro
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Fearful Presence
entries: Creatures within 30 feet of the gashadokuro have disadvantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened} or {@condition charmed}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the gashadokuro fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Revengeful Grudge
entries: When a creature damages the gashadokuro, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be a􀃧icted by the gashadokuro's grudge. While under the effects of the grudge, the creature has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks, and it takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage at the start of its turn. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The gashadokuro deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Undead Ambush
entries: The gashadokuro has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) ability checks.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the gashadokuro to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the gashadokuro drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gashadokuro makes two attacks. It can decide to replace one of its attacks with a Rend.

action.name: Bone Grasp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is automatically {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). The gashadokuro can have only one creature {@condition grappled} at a time.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Rend
entries: The gashadokuro targets one creature it is grappling. The target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or take 35 ({@damage 10d6}) slashing damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. On a success, the target takes half the damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The gashadokuro can attempt to swallow a creature it has {@condition grappled}. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be swallowed by the gashadokuro. A swallowed creature is {@condition restrained}, it has half cover against attacks and other effects outside the gashadokuro, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage at the start of each of the gashadokuro's turns. If the gashadokuro takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the gashadokuro must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the swallowed creature, which falls {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the gashadokuro. If the gashadokuro dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Deathly Rattle
entries: The gashadokuro emits an unsettling rattling sound that extends in a 60-foot radius centered around itself. Creatures within this area must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened}. A creature fightened this way has its movement speed reduced to 0. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Bone Shatter {@recharge 5}
entries: The gashadokuro releases a bone-chilling wave of energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw, taking 49 ({@damage 14d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Guardian Bond
entries: If the guardian lion (female) is reduced to 0 hit points, the guardian lion enters an enraged state. This state lasts for 1 hour, during which the guardian lion benefits from heightened abilities: its attacks deal an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) radiant damage on a hit, it gains resistance to all damage, and it can use its Necrotic Breath without the need to recharge it.

trait.name: Paw Smite
entries: Once per turn, when the guardian lion hits with a melee weapon attack, it can empower it, dealing an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) radiant damage to the target.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The guardian lion makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Necrotic Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The guardian lion exhales necrotic energy it accumulated by cleansing and storing negative energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, taking 42 ({@damage 12d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Roar of Valor (1/Day)
entries: The guardian lion lets out a mighty roar. For 1 minute, all allies within 60 feet of the guardian lion gain advantage on attack rolls and saving throws.
Additionally, allies of the guardian lion within this radius are immune to being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Guardian Bond
entries: If the guardian lion (male) is reduced to 0 hit points, the guardian lion enters an enraged state. This state lasts for 1 hour, during which the guardian lion benefits from heightened abilities: its attacks deal an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) radiant damage on a hit, it gains advantage on all saving throws, and it can use Lay Paws as a bonus action without expending hit points from its pool.

trait.name: Radiant Aura
entries: The guardian lion emits an aura of radiant energy in a 30-foot radius. Allies within this radius have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}, and any hostile creature that starts its turn in the aura take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The guardian lion makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Lay Paws (3/Day)
entries: The guardian lion touches a creature and restores 30 hit points to it. It has a pool of 90 hit points to use with this ability.

action.name: Benevolent Ward (1/Day)
entries: The guardian lion blesses its allies with divine protection. For 1 minute, all allies within 60 feet of the guardian lion gain resistance to all damage.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the cultivator is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Inner Qi
entries: The cultivator's inner energy grants a +1 bonus to saving throws (already included in the statblock).

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the cultivator is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cultivator makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Qi Wave {@recharge 5}
entries: The cultivator releases a wave of energy in a 40-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Martial Flurry
entries: After the cultivator takes the Multiattack action on its turn, it makes an additional weapon attack.

reaction.name: Qi Shield
entries: When the cultivator is hit by an attack, it creates a shield of energy, reducing the damage by 6 ({@dice 1d12}).

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the cultivator is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Inner Qi
entries: The cultivator's inner energy grants a +2 bonus to saving throws and AC (already included in the statblock).

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the cultivator fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Qi Presence
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the cultivator must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Creatures with a CR (or level) higher than 9 are immune to this trait. The cultivator can activate or deactivate this trait at will during its turn.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the cultivator is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cultivator makes three weapon attacks. It can replace one attack to use its Qi Wave.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Qi Wave {@recharge 4}
entries: The cultivator releases a wave of energy in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Martial Flurry
entries: After the cultivator takes the Multiattack action on its turn, it makes two additional weapon attacks.

bonus.name: Quick Step
entries: The cultivator takes the Disengage action, and its speed increases by 10 feet until the end of the turn.

reaction.name: Qi Shield
entries: When the cultivator is hit by an attack, it creates a shield of energy, reducing the damage by 13 ({@dice 2d12}).

reaction.name: Counterstrike
entries: When a melee attack misses the cultivator, the cultivator makes one melee attack against the attacker.

monster.name: Venerable Immortal Cultivator

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the cultivator is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Half Ascendant State (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the cultivator is reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit points instead reset to 125, its critical hit range is increased to 18-20, and it enters an Ascendant State, gaining an aura of power that imposes disadvantage on all attack rolls against it made by creatures within 30 feet of it for the next hour. The cultivator can now use the options in the {@b Mythic Actions} section for 1 hour.
Award a party an additional 13,000 XP (26,000 XP total) for defeating the cultivator after its Half Ascendant State trait activates.

trait.name: Inner Qi
entries: The cultivator's inner energy grants a +3 bonus to saving throws and AC (already included in the statblock).

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the cultivator fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Qi Presence
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the cultivator must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Creatures with a CR (or level) higher than 14 are immune to this trait. The cultivator can activate or deactivate this trait at will during its turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cultivator makes four weapon attacks. It can replace one attack to use its Qi Wave.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d6 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Qi Wave {@recharge 3}
entries: The cultivator releases a wave of energy in an 80-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 63 ({@damage 14d8}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Martial Flurry
entries: After the cultivator takes the Multiattack action on its turn, it makes three additional weapon attacks.

bonus.name: Quick Step
entries: The cultivator takes the Dash or Disengage action, and its speed increases by 20 feet until the end of the turn.

reaction.name: Qi Shield
entries: When the cultivator is hit by an attack, it creates a shield of energy, reducing the damage by 19 ({@dice 3d12}).

reaction.name: Counterstrike
entries: When a melee attack misses the cultivator, the cultivator makes two melee attacks against the attacker.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The cultivator makes one weapon attack.

legendary.name: Shadow Clones (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The cultivator conjures illusory duplicates of itself. Until the start of the cultivator's next turn, attack rolls have disadvantage against it.

legendary.name: Flash Step (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The cultivator teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 90 feet.

mythicHeader: If the cultivator's Half Ascendant State trait has activated in the last hour, it can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Qi Burst
entries: The cultivator sends out a burst of Qi energy in a 15-foot radius. Each creature other than the cultivator in that area must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

mythic.name: Heavenly Palm (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The cultivator makes a melee weapon attack with a +5 additional modifier to its attack roll and deals an additional 18 ({@damage 4d8}) force damage on a hit.

mythic.name: Ten Thousand Fists (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The cultivator unleashes a torrent of blows in a 20-foot radius around itself. Each creature in that area other than the cultivator must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 ({@damage 10d10}) bludgeoning damage and being {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn on a failed save, or half as much damage and not being {@condition stunned} on a successful one.

monster.name: Jiangshi
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Blind Sight Dependency
entries: The jiangshi relies heavily on its blindsight to perceive the world around it and is considered {@condition blinded} in areas outside its blindsight range. Additionally, it can't use its blindsight while {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: Easily Distracted
entries: The jiangshi has a short attention span and can be easily distracted by sudden movements or loud noises. Whenever a creature creates a sudden loud noise, the Jiangshi must make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or become distracted. While distracted, the Jiangshi has disadvantage on all attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn. Additionally, if the distraction is significant, such as a sudden explosion, the Jiangshi might lose track of its current target and move towards the direction of the distraction.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The jiangshi has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the jiangshi to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the jiangshi drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The jiangshi makes two attacks: one with its fist and one with its life drain.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage. The jiangshi regains hit points equal to the damage dealt. If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

monster.name: Jiangshi Lord
languages: speaks the languages it knew in life

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The jiangshi lord is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). The jiangshi lord has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Blind Sight Dependency
entries: The jiangshi lord relies heavily on its blindsight to perceive the world around it and is considered {@condition blinded} in areas outside its blindsight range. Additionally, it can't use its blindsight while {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the jiangshi lord fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The jiangshi lord has advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the jiangshi lord to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the jiangshi drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The jiangshi lord makes three attacks: two with its fist and one with its life drain.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d8}) necrotic damage. The jiangshi lord regains hit points equal to the damage dealt. If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

legendary.name: Fist Attack
entries: The jiangshi lord makes one attack with its fist.

legendary.name: Cast Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The jiangshi lord casts a spell.

legendary.name: Mass Life Drain (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Each creature within 20 feet of the jiangshi lord must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The jiangshi lord regains hit points equal to the total damage dealt. Undead and constructs are immune to this effect.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The kappa can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Slippery Grasp
entries: The kappa has advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to escape a grapple.

trait.name: Water Regeneration
entries: The kappa regains 1 hit point at the start of its turn if it is underwater and has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) slashing damage.

action.name: Water Jet
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} to hit, range 20/40 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) cold damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 5 feet away from the kappa.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The kappa can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Slippery Constitution
entries: The kappa has advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to escape a grapple.

trait.name: Water Regeneration
entries: The kappa regains 3 hit points at the start of its turn if it is underwater and has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Water Jet
entries: {@atk r} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away from the kappa and knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Dexterous Dodge
entries: When the kappa is targeted by an attack or spell that requires a Dexterity saving throw, it can use its reaction to move up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks and ignoring the effects of that ability if it moves out of its range.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The kappa can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Slippery Constitution
entries: The kappa has advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to escape a grapple. Its also has advantage on saving throws against being knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Water Regeneration
entries: The kappa regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn if it is underwater and has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kappa makes two attacks with its claws or three water jet attacks.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Water Jet
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 40/80 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 15 feet away from the kappa and knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Dexterous Dodge
entries: When the kappa is targeted by an attack or spell that requires a Dexterity saving throw, it can use its reaction to move up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks and ignoring the effects of that ability if it moves out of its range.

legendary.name: Swift Current
entries: The kappa creates a swift-moving current in a body of water within 60 feet of it. Each creature within the affected area must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet in a direction of the kappa's choice.

legendary.name: Water Jet
entries: The kappa makes one water jet attack with advantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Shapechange
entries: The kitsune can use its action to magically polymorph into a Medium humanoid form it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, don't change. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kitsune makes one attack with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite

action.name: Claw

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Breath of Mystic Flames {@recharge 5}
entries: The kitsune exhales a torrent of mystical flames in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 ({@dice 10d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Additionally, creatures that fail the saving throw are engulfed in ethereal flames for 1 minute. A creature engulfed in flames takes 9 ({@dice 2d8}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the kitsune fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Illusionary Shroud
entries: The kitsune weaves intricate illusions around itself, granting it advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d12 + 7}) slashing damage.

Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 72 ({@dice 16d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Additionally, creatures that fail the saving throw are engulfed in ethereal flames for 1 minute. A creature engulfed in flames takes 18 ({@dice 4d8}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: The kitsune makes one bite attack.

legendary.name: Foxfire (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kitsune conjures magical foxfire that hovers in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point it can see within 120 feet of it. The foxfire lasts until the start of the kitsune's next turn. The area is difficult terrain for creatures other than the kitsune. A creature that enters the foxfire's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) radiant damage. The kitsune regains hit points equal to the damage dealt in this way.

legendary.name: Dazzling Illusion (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The kitsune creates an illusory display of lights and images in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} for 1 minute. While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature is also {@condition incapacitated}. A {@condition charmed} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. The charm ends if a creature takes damage or if another creature uses its action to shake the {@condition charmed} target out of its stupor.

trait.name: Keen Senses

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail Swipe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Gale Force Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The kun peng exhales a powerful blast of wind in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) bludgeoning damage and is pushed up to 20 feet away from the kun peng. On a successful save, the creature takes half the damage and isn't pushed.

entries: The kun peng exhales a mighty gust of wind in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 77 ({@damage 14d10}) bludgeoning damage and is pushed up to 30 feet away from the kun peng. On a successful save, the creature takes half the damage and isn't pushed.

legendary.name: Sweeping Gust (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kun peng creates a strong blast of wind in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or take 27 ({@damage 6d8}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Celestial Radiance
entries: The longma radiates an aura shedding bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. Each creature of the longma's choice that starts its turn in the bright light must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 3 ({@damage 1d6}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures that start their turn in the dim light must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 2 ({@damage 1d4}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. This aura can be dismissed as a bonus action.

trait.name: Nimble Dash
entries: The longma can use a bonus action to Dash or Disengage on its turn.

action.name: Hooves
