mythicHeader: If the elder lindworm's Scale Resurgence trait has activated in the last hour, it can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Bite Attack
entries: The lindworm makes one bite attack.

mythic.name: Scale Restoration (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The scales of the lindworm magically reforms, granting it 30 temporary hit points and recharging its Mystic Scales trait. The lindworm can use this ability only if its scales are currently broken.

mythic.name: Toxic Surge (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: A surge of toxic energy radiates from the lindworm. Each creature within 30 feet of the lindworm must make a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw, taking 54 ({@damage 12d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Ancient Lindworm
languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

trait.name: Acidic Blood
entries: A creature that touches the lindworm or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the lindworm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Mystic Scales (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The lindworm possesses mystic scales that grant it 200 temporary hit points and resistance to all damage except psychic damage. A section of the scales is broken either by depleting the lindworm's temporary hit points or by hitting it with a critical hit, causing the loss of any remaining temporary hit points. After the scales are broken, each time a creature within 30 feet of the lindworm makes an attack roll against it, the attacker must declare whether they are targeting the lindworm or its weak point. Attacking a weak point grants the lindworm a +3 bonus to AC against that attack, but the attack ignores the lindworm's resistances granted by this trait. Once a scale is broken, attacks that affect an area automatically ignore the lindworm's resistances. The lyndworm's scales reform after a long rest.

trait.name: Scale Resurgence (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the lindworm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point instead resets to 225 hit points, it recharges its Mystic Scales trait, and it regains one expended use of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the lindworm can now use the options in the {@b Mythic Actions} section for 1 hour.
Award a party an additional 50,000 XP (100,000 XP total) for defeating the lindworm after its Scale Resurgence trait activates.

trait.name: Venomous Fumes
entries: The lindworm exudes venomous fumes in a 30-foot radius around it. Each creature that starts its turn in this area must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn.

variant.name: Magic Resistance and Limited Magic Immunity
entries: In Norse legends and myths, Lindworms are frequently depicted as creatures enveloped in a mystical aura that grants them a robust defense against magical attacks. Game Masters might choose to emphasize this mythic characteristic, enhancing the lindworm's defense mechanisms in their epic battles. In a similar case, consider adding the following trait to lindworms:

items: {@b Magic Resistance:} The lindworm has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
Elder or ancient lindworms could even possess an additional layer of defense against magical attacks to signify their ancient power and exceptional resilience against the arcane.
{@b Limited Magic Immunity:} Unless it wishes to be affected, the lindworm is immune to spells of 4th level or lower. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

A {@condition poisoned} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.

monster.name: Nidhogg

trait.name: Aura of Desolation
entries: Creatures within 300 feet of Nidhogg and aware of its presence have disadvantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
entries: If Nidhogg fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: Unless it wishes to be affected, Nidhogg is immune to spells of 4th level or lower. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Mystic Scales (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Nidhogg possesses mystic scales that grant it 225 temporary hit points and resistance to all damage except psychic damage. A section of the scales is broken either by depleting Nidhogg's temporary hit points or by hitting it with a critical hit, causing the loss of any remaining temporary hit points. After the scales are broken, each time a creature within 30 feet of Nidhogg makes an attack roll against it, the attacker must declare whether they are targeting Nidhogg or its weak point. Attacking a weak point grants Nidhogg a +3 bonus to AC against that attack, but the attack ignores Nidhogg's resistances granted by this trait.
Once a scale is broken, attacks that affect an area automatically ignore Nidhogg's resistances. Nidhogg's scales reform after a long rest.

trait.name: Roots of Yggdrasil (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Nidhogg would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit points instead resets to 273 hit points, it recharges its Toxic Breath and its Mystic Scales trait, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, Nidhogg can now use the options in the {@b Mythic Actions} section for 1 hour.
Award a party an additional 105,000 XP (210,000 XP total) for defeating Nidhogg after its Roots of Yggdrasil trait activates.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Nidhogg can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d10 + 10}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage and 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d6 + 10}) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 22}) and {@condition restrained} until this grapple ends. Nidhogg can have only one creature {@condition grappled} this way at a time.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of Nidhogg's choice that is within 300 feet of Nidhogg and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 24} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Nidhogg's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Toxic Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Nidhogg exhales poisonous gas in a 120-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 26} Constitution saving throw, taking 52 ({@dice 8d12}) acid and 52 ({@damage 8d12}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries: Nidhogg makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

Each creature within 15 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw or take 23 ({@damage 3d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. Nidhogg can then fly up to half its flying speed.

legendary.name: Toxic Breath (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Nidhogg immediately uses its Toxic Breath.

Each creature in that area other than Nidhogg must succeed on a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) necrotic damage and be {@condition restrained} by the roots for 1 minute. A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 22} Strength check, freeing itself on a success.

mythic.name: Toxic Burst (Costs 3 Actions)

languages: understands all languages but communicates only through telepathy 120 ft.

trait.name: Agile Escape
entries: Ratatoskr doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it moves out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Ancient Knowledge
entries: Ratatoskr has accumulated immense knowledge, and knows any information about lore, history, or the arcane.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If Ratatoskr dies, its spirit returns to the vicinity of the Yggdrasil Tree and it is resurrected with all its hit points after {@dice 1d4} hours. Ratatoskr can be permanently killed only if the Yggdrasil Tree is destroyed.

action.name: Tiny Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d4 + 7}) piercing damage.

entries: Ratatoskr causes animosity between two creatures within 60 feet. Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or use its action every turn to attack the other creature for 1 minute. A creature affected by animosity can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

reaction.name: Evasive
entries: Ratatoskr adds +7 to its AC against one attack that would hit it. To do so, Ratatoskr must see the attacker. If the attack misses, Ratatoskr can immediately move up to its speed as part of the same reaction.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The skald wanderer is a 5th-level spellcaster.
Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). The skald knows the following spells:

trait.name: Bardic Knowledge
entries: The skald has advantage on Intelligence ({@skill History}) and Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) checks.

trait.name: Lore of the Ancients
entries: The skald has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skald makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Song of the Fallen (1/Day)
entries: The skald wanderer sings an ancient dirge. All creatures within 30 feet of it that can hear the song must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. A {@condition paralyzed} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus.name: Skaldic Inspiration {@recharge 5}
entries: The skald inspires another creature it can see within 60 feet of it, granting it advantage on the next attack roll, saving throw, or ability check it makes within the next minute.

reaction.name: Tale of the Brave
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the skald is hit by an attack, the skald grants it a +2 bonus to AC against that attack, potentially causing it to miss.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The skald poet is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). The skald knows the following spells:

trait.name: Bardic Knowledge
entries: The skald has advantage on Intelligence ({@skill History}) and Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) checks.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the skald fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Lore of the Ancients
entries: The skald has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skald poet makes two weapon attacks. It can replace one of these attacks to cast a spell or use one of its Songs.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage, or 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Song of the Fallen (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The skald poet sings an ancient dirge. All creatures within 30 feet of it that can hear the song must make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. A {@condition paralyzed} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Song of Renewal (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The skald poet performs a rejuvenating song. Each creature of the skald's choice choice within 30 feet of it regains 23 ({@dice 4d8 + 5}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

bonus.name: Skaldic Inspiration {@recharge 4}
entries: The skald inspires another creature it can see within 60 feet of it, granting it advantage on the next attack roll, saving throw, or ability check it makes within the next minute.

reaction.name: Tale of the Brave
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the skald is hit by an attack, the skald grants it a +3 bonus to AC against that attack, potentially causing it to miss.

monster.name: Skald of the Sagas

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The skald of the sagas is a 13th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 20}, {@hit 12} to hit with spell attacks). The skald knows the following spells:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the skald fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Lore of the Ancients
entries: The skald has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The skald's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Saga of Victory (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the skald of the sagas would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit points instead reset to 145, and it regains all expended spell slots and uses of its Songs. Additionally, the skald can now use the options in the {@b Mythic Actions} section for 1 hour.
Award the party an additional 13,000 XP (26,000 XP total) for defeating the skald of the sagas after its Saga of Victory trait activates.

trait.name: Wisdom of the Ages
entries: The skald of the sagas has advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma ability checks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skald of the sagas makes three weapon attacks. It can replace one of these attacks to cast a spell and one to use one of its Songs.

action.name: +1 Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) slashing damage, or 12 ({@damage 1d10 + 7}) slashing damage if wielded with two hands.

action.name: +1 Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Song of the Fallen (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The skald of the sagas sings an ancient dirge. All creatures within 60 feet of it that can hear the song must make a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. A {@condition stunned} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Song of Renewal (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The skald of the sagas performs a rejuvenating song. Each creature of the skald's choice choice within 60 feet of it regains 43 ({@dice 8d8 + 7}) hit points and is freed from any harmful condition affecting it.

action.name: Song of the Epic Sagas (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The skald of the sagas performs a song recounting of epic sagas. Each creature of the skald's choice choice within 60 feet of it gains advantage on all attack rolls, saving throws, and ability checks for 1 minute or until the skald loses its {@status concentration} (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell).

bonus.name: Skaldic Inspiration {@recharge 3}
entries: The skald inspires another creature it can see within 60 feet of it, granting it advantage on the next attack roll, saving throw, or ability check it makes within the next hour.

reaction.name: Tale of the Brave
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the skald is hit by an attack, the skald grants it a +5 bonus to AC against that attack, potentially causing it to miss. If the attack misses, the skald can make one weapon attack against the attacking creature.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The skald makes one weapon attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The skald moves up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Spellcasting (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The skald casts a spell.

mythicHeader: If the skald's Saga of Victory trait has activated in the last hour, it can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Runes of Power (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The skald inscribes mystical runes in the air, casting a spell of 4th level or lower without expending a spell slot.

mythic.name: Epic Verse (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The skald of the sagas recites a powerful verse from an ancient saga, replicating the effects of one of its Songs. 209 Norse Mythology

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The svartálfar shadowblade's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Necrotic Weapons
entries: The svartálfar's weapon attacks are magical and deal necrotic damage.

trait.name: Umbral Sight
entries: The svartálfar can see normally in darkness, both magical and non-magical, out to a range of 120 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The svartálfar shadowblade makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) necrotic damage.

bonus.name: Shadowstep
entries: The svartálfar teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see that is in dim light or darkness, gaining advantage on the next weapon attack it makes until the end of the current turn.

reaction.name: Shadow Veil
entries: When the svartálfar is the target of an attack, it cloaks itself in shadows, imposing disadvantage on the attack roll.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The svartálfar spellweaver is a 13th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Necrotic Weapons
entries: The svartálfar's weapon attacks are magical and deal necrotic damage.

trait.name: Umbral Sight
entries: The svartálfar can see normally in darkness, both magical and non-magical, out to a range of 120 feet.

action.name: Shadow Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) necrotic damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage. The target must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} until the start of the svartálfar spellweaver's next turn.

bonus.name: Shadowstep
entries: The svartálfar teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see that is in dim light or darkness, gaining advantage on the next weapon attack it makes until the end of the current turn.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The svartálfar nightwarden's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Necrotic Weapons
entries: The svartálfar's weapon attacks are magical and deal necrotic damage.

trait.name: Umbral Sight
entries: The svartálfar can see normally in darkness, both magical and non-magical, out to a range of 120 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nightwarden makes three weapon attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) necrotic damage.

bonus.name: Shadowstep
entries: The svartálfar teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see that is in dim light or darkness, gaining advantage on the next weapon attack it makes until the end of the current turn.

reaction.name: Shadow Veil
entries: When the svartálfar is the target of an attack, it cloaks itself in shadows, imposing disadvantage on the attack roll.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The svartálfar nightbringer's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the svartálfar nightbringer fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Necrotic Weapons
entries: The svartálfar's weapon attacks are magical and deal necrotic damage.

trait.name: Shadow Regeneration
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the svartálfar nightbringer regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the nightbringer takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the nightbringer's next turn.
The svartálfar nightbringer dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Umbral Sight
entries: The svartálfar can see normally in darkness, both magical and non-magical, out to a range of 120 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nightbringer makes three weapon attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Shadow Burst {@recharge 5}
entries: The svartálfar nightbringer releases a burst of shadow energy. Each creature of the nightbringer's choice within 30 feet of it must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 42 ({@damage 12d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The affected area becomes a zone of magical darkness as per the {@spell darkness} spell for the next minute.

bonus.name: Shadowstep
entries: The svartálfar teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see that is in dim light or darkness, gaining advantage on the next weapon attack it makes until the end of the current turn and dealing an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage on a hit.

reaction.name: Shadow Veil
entries: When the svartálfar is the target of an attack, it cloaks itself in shadows, imposing disadvantage on the attack roll.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The svartálfar nightbringer moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Shadow Strike (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The svartálfar nightbringer makes one longsword attack, dealing an additional 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage on a hit.

legendary.name: Cast Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The svartálfar nightbringer casts a spell with its Innate Spellcasting trait.

legendary.name: Harbinger of Night (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The nightbringer uses its Shadow Burst.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The troll whelp regains 1 hit point at the start of its turn. If the troll whelp takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the whelp's next turn.
The troll whelp dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The cave troll has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The cave troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the cave troll has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cave troll makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its claw.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The river troll can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Aquatic Camouflage
entries: The troll has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made while partially submerged in water.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The river troll can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The river troll has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The river troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Waterborne
entries: The river troll has advantage on attack rolls made while completely submerged in water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The river troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tidal Surge {@recharge 5}
entries: The river troll calls upon the water in its vicinity to surge and lash out at its foes. Each creature within 15 feet of the troll must make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) bludgeoning damage and being knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or half as much damage and not being knocked {@condition prone} on a successful one. The river troll can only use this ability while inside a body of water or within 30 feet of it.

reaction.name: Water Shield
entries: The river troll magically forms a protective shield of water around it, adding 3 to its AC against one attack that would hit it. To do so, the river troll must see the attacker. The river troll can only use this ability while inside a body of water or within 30 feet of it.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The forest troll's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Forest Camouflage
entries: The forest troll has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in forest terrain.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The forest troll has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The forest troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it isn't in sunlight. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
entries: The forest troll can speak with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the forest troll has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Tree Stride
entries: Once on its turn, the forest troll can use 10 feet of movement to step magically into one tree within its reach and emerge from a second tree within 60 feet of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The forest troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. Alternatively, it can cast a spell and make an attack with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Earth Walk
entries: The stone troll ignores difficult terrain in rocky surfaces.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The stone troll regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The stone troll deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The stone troll has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The stone troll makes three attacks: one with its stomp and two with its fists.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@dice 4d10 + 7}) bludgeoning. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Stoneskin {@recharge 5}
entries: The stone troll hardens its skin until the start of its next turn. Any creature that hits the troll with a melee weapon attack while its skin is hardened takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Boulder Stance
entries: When hit by a ranged attack, the stone troll attempts to absorb the projectile. The troll makes a Constitution saving throw with a DC equal to the damage dealt by the attack. On a successful save, the troll absorbs the projectile and takes no damage from it.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The trollkonor is a 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The trollkonor has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The trollkonor regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it isn't in sunlight. If the trollkonor takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the trollkonor's next turn. The trollkonor dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the trollkonor has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The trollkonor can make two attacks with its claws or cast a spell and make one attack with its claws.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the trollkonor regains hit points equal to half that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

bonus.name: Dark Curse {@recharge 5}
entries: The trollkonor attempts to curse a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be cursed for 1 minute. While cursed, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls, saving throws, and ability checks. Any attack the trollkonor makes against a cursed target deals an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage. The curse ends early if the trollkonor is {@condition incapacitated} or dies. The trollkonor can have only one target cursed at a time.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Mountain Born
entries: The mountain troll has advantage on saving throws against being knocked {@condition prone} or pushed against its will. Additionally, the troll ignores difficult terrain in stony or rocky surfaces.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The mountain troll has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The mountain troll regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The mountain troll deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The mountain troll has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mountain troll makes three attacks: one with its stomp and two with its fists.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}34 ({@damage 4d12 + 8}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Rockslide {@recharge 5}
entries: The mountain troll causes a small avalanche or rockslide if within stony or rocky terrain.

Creatures other than the troll within a 30-foot radius centered on the troll must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 42 ({@damage 12d6}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Seismic Stomp {@recharge 5}
entries: The mountain troll stomps the ground. All creatures within 15 feet must make a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The ulfhednar scout has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ulfhednar scout has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the scout's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Wolf's Prowl
entries: The ulfhednar scout has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) and Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ulfhednar warrior has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warrior's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the ulfhednar warrior can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Wolf's Prowl
entries: The ulfhednar warrior has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) and Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Animal Companion
entries: The ulfhednar beastmaster is accompanied by a {@creature feral wolf|MythologicalCreatures}, which obeys the beastmaster's commands and acts on its own initiative.

trait.name: Bonded Fury
entries: When the {@creature feral wolf|MythologicalCreatures} accompanying the ulfhednar beastmaster takes damage, the beastmaster goes into a primal fury until the end of its next turn, dealing an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) slashing damage each time it hits with a weapon attack.

trait.name: Feral Instinct
entries: The ulfhednar beastmaster has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Animal Handling}) checks.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ulfhednar beastmaster has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the beastmaster's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Wolf's Prowl
entries: The ulfhednar beastmaster has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) and Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if wielded with two hands.

bonus.name: Wolf Command
entries: The ulfhednar beastmaster commands its {@creature feral wolf|MythologicalCreatures} to perform one of the following actions, provided the wolf expends a reaction to perform it.

bonus.name: Coordinated Attack
entries: The wolf makes a bite attack against a target the beastmaster has attacked this turn.

bonus.name: Guard
entries: The wolf takes a defensive stance, granting it a +2 bonus to AC until the start of the beastmaster's next turn.

bonus.name: Intimidating Snarl
entries: The wolf lets out a fearsome snarl, causing one creature of the beastmaster's choice within 15 feet to succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes.

bonus.name: Pack Hunter
entries: The wolf aids the beastmaster, granting it a +2 bonus on its next attack and damage roll against a creature that is within 5 feet of the wolf.

bonus.name: Stalking Shadow
entries: The wolf moves stealthily, granting it advantage on the next Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) check it makes until the start of the beastmaster's next turn.

bonus.name: Tactical Retreat
entries: The wolf moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Bonded Fury
entries: When the ulfhednar beastmaster accompanied by the feral wolf takes damage, the wolf goes into a primal fury until the end of its next turn, dealing an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage each time it hits with a weapon attack.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The feral wolf has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The feral wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ulfhednar shaman is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). The shaman has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ulfhednar shaman has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the shaman's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the ulfhednar shaman can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Wolf's Prowl
entries: The ulfhednar shaman has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) and Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ulfhednar shaman makes two quarterstaff attacks. Alternatively, it makes one quarterstaff attack and casts one spell with a casting time of one action.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit ({@hit 5} to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the ulfhednar berserker hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ulfhednar berserker has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the berserker's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the ulfhednar berserker can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Wolf's Prowl
entries: The ulfhednar berserker has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) and Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ulfhednar berserker makes two attacks with its greataxe.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: War Howl (1/Day)
entries: The ulfhednar berserker lets out a mighty howl. Each creature of the ulfhednar berserker's choice that is within 30 feet of it and can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ulfhednar war-priest is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). The war-priest has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ulfhednar war-priest has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warpriest's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the ulfhednar war-priest can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Wolf's Prowl
entries: The ulfhednar war-priest has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) and Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ulfhednar war-priest makes two attacks with its warhammer. Alternatively, it makes one attack with its warhammer and casts a spell with a casting time of one action.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the ulfhednar vargrherjar hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ulfhednar vargrherjar has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vargrherjar's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the ulfhednar vargrherjar can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Wolf's Prowl
entries: The ulfhednar vargrherjar has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) and Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ulfhednar vargrherjar makes three attacks with its greataxe.

action.name: +1 Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d12 + 6}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: War Howl (2/Day)
entries: The ulfhednar vargrherjar lets out a mighty howl. Each creature of the vargrherjar's choice that is within 30 feet of it and can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature {@condition frightened} in this way also has its speed reduced by 10 feet for the duration. A {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The valkyrie is a 13th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 19}, {@hit 11} to hit with spell attacks). The valkyrie has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: The valkyrie knows if she hears a lie.

trait.name: Divine Resilience
entries: While below her half hit points maximum, the valkyrie has advantage on all saving throws and resistance to all damage types.

trait.name: Divine Weapons
entries: The valkyrie's weapon attacks are magical and deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) radiant damage (already included in the attacks).

trait.name: Inspiring Presence
entries: Friendly creatures within 30 feet of the valkyrie have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the valkyrie fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The valkyrie has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The valkyrie makes three weapon attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
entries: The valkyrie touches another creature. The target magically regains 40 ({@dice 8d8 + 4}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

bonus.name: Divine Smite
entries: When the valkyrie hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, she can expend one spell slot to deal radiant damage to the target, in addition to the weapon's damage. The extra damage is {@dice 1d8} for a 1st-level spell slot, plus {@dice 1d8} for each spell level higher than 1st.

bonus.name: Voice of Command
entries: The valkyrie issues a command to an ally that she can see within 60 feet. The ally can immediately use its reaction to make one weapon attack.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The valkyrie makes one weapon attack.

legendary.name: Move (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The valkyrie moves up to her speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If the valkyrie is mounted, her mount moves instead.

legendary.name: Healing Touch (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The valkyrie uses her Healing Touch.

legendary.name: Cast Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The valkyrie casts a spell using her Spellcasting trait.

monster.name: Valkyrie Queen

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The valkyrie queen is a 17th-level spellcaster.
Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 22}, {@hit 14} to hit with spell attacks). The valkyrie has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: The valkyrie queen knows if she hears a lie.

trait.name: Divine Resilience
entries: When reduced to half her hit points or less, the valkyrie queen gains advantage on all saving throws and resistance to all damage.

trait.name: Divine Weapons
entries: The valkyrie queen's weapon attacks are magical and deal an extra 17 ({@damage 5d6}) radiant damage (already included in the attacks).

trait.name: Echoes of Valhalla (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the valkyrie queen would be reduced to 0 hit points, her current hit points instead reset to 225. Additionally, the valkyrie queen can now use the options in the {@b Mythic Actions} section for 1 hour.
Award a party an additional 90,000 XP (180,000 XP total) for defeating the valkyrie queen after her Echoes of Valhalla trait activates.

trait.name: Inspiring Presence
entries: Friendly creatures within 30 feet of the valkyrie queen are immune to being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If the valkyrie queen fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The valkyrie queen has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The valkyrie queen makes three weapon attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) slashing damage plus 17 ({@damage 5d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage plus 17 ({@damage 5d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
entries: The valkyrie touches another creature. The target magically regains 60 ({@dice 12d8 + 6}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

bonus.name: Divine Smite
entries: When the valkyrie queen hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, it can expend one spell slot to deal radiant damage to the target, in addition to the weapon's damage. The extra damage is {@dice 2d8} for a 1st-level spell slot, plus {@dice 1d8} for each spell level higher than 1st, up to a maximum of {@dice 5d8}.

bonus.name: Voice of Command
entries: The valkyrie queen issues a command to an ally that she can see within 60 feet. The ally can immediately use its reaction to make one weapon attack.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The valkyrie queen makes one weapon attack.

legendary.name: Move (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The valkyrie queen moves up to her speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If the valkyrie is mounted, her mount moves instead.

legendary.name: Healing Touch (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The valkyrie queen uses her Healing Touch.

legendary.name: Cast Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The valkyrie queen casts a spell with her Spellcasting trait.

mythicHeader: If the valkyrie queen's Echoes of Valhalla trait has activated in the last hour, she can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Heavenly Restoration (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The valkyrie queen calls upon divine energies to heal herself. She regains 33 ({@dice 6d8 + 6}) hit points.

mythic.name: Searing Burst (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The valkyrie queen releases a burst of divine energy. Each creature within 60 feet of her must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 ({@damage 12d8}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the divine steed moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a hooves attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Divine Weapons
entries: The divine steed's weapon attacks are magical and deal an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage (already included in the attacks).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The divine steed makes two attacks with its hooves.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
entries: The steed touches another creature.
The target magically regains 22 ({@dice 4d8 + 4}) hit points.

reaction.name: Divine Shield
entries: When a creature within 60 feet of the divine steed would be hit by an attack, the steed creates a divine shield to protect the target, granting it a +2 bonus to AC until the start of the creature's next turn.

trait.name: Forest's Whisper
entries: The alux can communicate with plants and animals as if under the effect of a speak with plants or {@spell speak with animals} spell.

action.name: Mischievous Trick
entries: The alux creates a minor illusionary sound or image within a 15-foot radius.

action.name: Dart Throw
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Forest's Whisper
entries: The alux can communicate with plants and animals as if under the effect of a speak with plants or {@spell speak with animals} spell.

action.name: Touch of the Forest
entries: The alux instantly makes flowers blossom, seed pods open, or leaf buds bloom in a 5-foot radius centered on itself.

action.name: Dart Throw
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Summon Giant Lizard (1/Day)
entries: The alux summons a giant lizard, which appears in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of it. The summoned lizard obeys the commands of the alux and acts on its own turn. It remains for 1 hour, until it drops to 0 hit points, or until the alux dismisses it as a bonus action.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The alux shaman is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Forest's Whisper
entries: The alux can communicate with plants and animals as if under the effect of a speak with plants or {@spell speak with animals} spell.

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The alux warlock is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following spells:

trait.name: Forest's Whisper
entries: The alux can communicate with plants and animals as if under the effect of a speak with plants or {@spell speak with animals} spell.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Fearless
entries: The alux's intense rage and battle focus grant it advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Forest's Fury
entries: When below half its hit point maximum, the alux deals an extra 2 ({@damage 1d4}) damage with melee attacks.

trait.name: Forest's Whisper
entries: The alux can communicate with plants and animals as if under the effect of a speak with plants or {@spell speak with animals} spell.

trait.name: Primal Intuition
entries: The alux has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks made in forest and jungle terrains.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the alux is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Constitution modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The alux makes two attacks with its macuahuitl.

action.name: Macuahuitl
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: War Shout (1/Day)
entries: The alux lets out a fierce shout, instilling fear and disarray among its enemies. All enemy creatures within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. This shout also emboldens allies within 30 feet of the alux, granting them advantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the start of the alux's next turn.

bonus.name: Frenzied Attack (2/Day)
entries: The alux enters a frenzy for 1 minute, making one additional attack with its macuahuitl as part of its Multiattack. While frenzied, the alux has advantage on Strength ability checks and saving throws, but it can't cast spells or concentrate on them.

monster.name: Anchanchu
languages: understands all languages but can't speak

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The anchanchu can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form.

trait.name: Terrifying Presence
entries: Creatures within 30 feet that can see the anchanchu must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the anchanchu's Terrifying Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The anchanchu makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Psychic Feedback
entries: When a creature the anchanchu can see hits it with an attack, the anchanchu forces the attacker to make a {@dc 17} Intelligence saving throw. On a failure, the attacker takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage and is {@condition stunned} until the start of the anchanchu's next turn.

trait.name: Forest Camouflage
entries: The bigfoot has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in forest terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bigfoot makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Evasive
entries: When targeted by an attack, the bigfoot moves up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Alpha Presence
entries: The bigfoot alpha exudes an aura of dominance and authority that other bigfoot creatures naturally follow. Every other bigfoot creature within 60 feet of the bigfoot alpha gain advantage on attack rolls and saving throws.

trait.name: Forest Camouflage
entries: The bigfoot alpha has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in forest terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bigfoot alpha makes two slam attacks or two rock throw attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d12 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock Throw
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

bonus.name: Mighty Strike
entries: The bigfoot alpha channels its energy towards a single target, dealing an additional 11 ({@damage 2d10}) damage on its next attack. This bonus action can be used only if the bigfoot hasn't moved during this turn, and after using this bonus action, its speed is reduced to 0 until the end of the current turn.

reaction.name: Evasive
entries: When targeted by an attack, the bigfoot alpha moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The bigfoot alpha moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Slam (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The bigfoot alpha makes one slam attack.

legendary.name: Intimidating Roar (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The bigfoot alpha lets out a powerful roar. Each creature within 60 feet of the bigfoot that can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monster.name: Grey Cadejo
languages: understands Common and Sylvan but can't speak

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The cadejo has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: The cadejo can communicate telepathically with any creature it has {@condition charmed}, and it can perceive through the {@condition charmed} creature's senses as long as they are on the same plane of existence.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cadejo makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Mystic Gaze
entries: The cadejo locks eyes with a creature it can see within 30 feet. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} for 1 minute. A creature {@condition charmed} in this way is {@condition incapacitated} and has a speed of 0. The effect ends if the cadejo or one of the cadejo's companions harms the target. The cadejo can have only one target {@condition charmed} at a time. If the target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the cadejo's Mystic Gaze for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Telepathic Shield
entries: When a creature the cadejo can see targets it with an attack, the cadejo imposes disadvantage on the attack roll.

monster.name: White Cadejo
languages: understands Common and Sylvan but can't speak

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The cadejo has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Protective Aura
entries: The cadejo exudes an aura of protection in a 15-foot radius. Friendly creatures in this area have resistance to damage from spells and other magical effects, and are immune to being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cadejo makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
entries: The cadejo touches another creature with its nose. The target magically regains 20 ({@dice 4d8 + 2}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

reaction.name: Protective Shield
entries: When a creature the cadejo can see targets another creature within 60 feet of the cadejo with an attack, the cadejo imposes disadvantage on the attack roll.

monster.name: Black Cadejo
languages: understands Common and Sylvan but can't speak

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The cadejo has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Curse Infliction
entries: Any creature hit by the cadejo must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be cursed. A cursed target has disadvantage on attack rolls, saving throws, and ability checks until the curse is lifted by a {@spell remove curse} spell or similar magic or when the cadejo dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cadejo makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage. The cadejo regains hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage.

bonus.name: Dark Leap {@recharge 5}
entries: The cadejo leaps through the shadows to appear at any location it can see within 60 feet.

reaction.name: Shadowy Escape
entries: When the cadejo takes damage, it turns {@condition invisible} until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: Camazotz can't use its blindsight while {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: Camazotz has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Camazotz fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Camazotz makes four attacks: two with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Sonic Screech {@recharge 5}
entries: Camazotz emits a piercing screech. Each other creature within 60 feet of it that can hear it must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw, taking 55 ({@damage 10d10}) thunder damage and being {@condition deafened} for 1 minute on a failed save, or half as much damage and not being {@condition deafened} on a successful one.

legendary.name: Bite Attack
entries: Camazotz makes one bite attack.

legendary.name: Wings of Night
entries: Camazotz flaps its mighty wings, creating a gust of wind in a 30-foot cone. Creatures in the area must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Healing Darkness (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Camazotz absorbs the shadows around it, regaining 20 hit points.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The canotila's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Forest Guardian
entries: The canotila has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bloom {@recharge 5}
entries: The canotila targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. Flowers bloom around the target, who regains 7 ({@dice 2d6}) hit points and has advantage on the next attack roll before the end of its next turn.

monster.name: Canotila of the Great Blooming Forest

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The canotila's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Fey Insight
entries: The canotila can sense disturbances in the natural world. It has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks to notice hidden creatures and traps in forested environments.

trait.name: Forest Protector
entries: The canotila has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
Additionally, friendly creatures within 30 feet of the canotila have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Heart of the Forest
entries: As long as the canotila is within its native forest, it regenerates 5 hit points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Photosynthesis
entries: While in sunlight, the canotila gains 5 temporary hit points at the start of each of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The canotila makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bloom Surge {@recharge 5}
entries: The canotila releases a wave of vibrant energy in a 30-foot radius. Friendly creatures in the area regain 14 ({@dice 4d6}) hit points, and hostile creatures in the area must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the canotila until the end of their next turn.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The canotila's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Wither {@recharge 5}
entries: The canotila targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the target is a plant or a magical plant, it makes the saving throw with disadvantage.

monster.name: Canotila of the Great Wilted Forest

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The canotila's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Corrupted Guardian
entries: The canotila has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
Additionally, the canotilla can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Sickly Aura
entries: The canotila's aura extends into its attacks. A creature hit by its slam has disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes within 1 minute.

trait.name: Twisted Growth
entries: The canotila's presence disrupts natural healing. When a creature within 30 feet of the canotila regains hit points, it regains only half the normal amount.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The canotila makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Decay Wave {@recharge 5}
entries: The canotila releases a wave of corrupt energy in a 30-foot radius. Each other creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Plants in the area are automatically affected and take maximum damage.

reaction.name: Life Drain {@recharge 5}
entries: When a creature within 10 feet of the canotila is reduced to 0 hit points, the canotila absorbs the creature's life force, regaining 23 ({@dice 5d8}) hit points.

monster.name: Cipactli

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Cipactli's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 20}, {@hit 12} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Cipactli can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Chaotic Surge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Cipactli would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit points instead resets to 280 and it regains one expended use of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, Cipactli can now use the options in the {@b Mythic Actions} section for 1 hour.
Award a party an additional 33,000 XP (66,000 XP total) for defeating Cipactli after his Chaotic Surge trait activates.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Cipactli fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Lord of the Deep
entries: While in water, Cipactli regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Primal Awareness
entries: Cipactli can sense the presence of creatures within 1 mile of it in water, and within 100 feet of it on land.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: Cipactli deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Cipactli makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d10 + 10}) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 21}). Cipactli can have a maximum of one creature {@condition grappled} in this way at any time.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Swallow
entries: Cipactli makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller target that is {@condition grappled}. On a hit, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside Cipactli, and it takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) acid damage at the start of each of Cipactli's turns. If Cipactli takes 40 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, Cipactli must succeed on a Constitution saving throw with a DC equal to half the damage taken (rounded up) at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of Cipactli. If Cipactli dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 30 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Chaotic Rebuke
entries: After being hit by an attack, Cipactli releases a burst of chaotic energy, dealing 10 ({@damage 3d6}) force damage to the the attacker if it is within 10 feet of Cipactli.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: Cipactli makes one tail attack.

legendary.name: Surge (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Cipactli releases a surge of aquatic energy. Each other creature within 60 feet of it must make a {@dc 25} Strength saving throw or be pushed away up to 10 feet in a direction of Cipactli's choice and knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Engulf (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Cipactli makes one bite attack against a target. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed.

legendary.name: Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Cipactli casts a spell with its Innate Spellcasting trait.

mythicHeader: If Cipactli's Chaotic Surge trait has activated in the last hour, it can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Grevious Bite
entries: Cipactli makes one bite attack. If the attack hits, it deals an additional 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage, and Cipactli regains hit points equal to half the necrotic damage dealt.

mythic.name: Summon Waters (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Cipactli calls forth turbulent waters in a 120-foot radius centered on itself. The area becomes difficult terrain, and each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 25} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. Cipactli is immune to this effect.

mythic.name: Chaotic Vortex (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Cipactli creates a swirling vortex of chaotic energy in a 30-foot radius centered on itself. Each creature in that area other than Cipactli must make a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw, taking 56 ({@damage 16d6}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Objects in the area also take the damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Cipitio's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Cigar Smoke
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30 ft., one target. {@h}The target is {@condition blinded} until the start of Cipitio's next turn.

reaction.name: Mischievous Escape
entries: When Cipitio is hit by an attack, he turns {@condition invisible} and moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The cosmic shaman is a 9th-level spellcaster.
Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). The shaman has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Ancestral Guidance
entries: The shaman can communicate with ancestral spirits, granting it advantage on Wisdom checks.

trait.name: Cosmic Knowledge
entries: The shaman has insight into celestial events and can predict auspicious moments, gaining advantage on Initiative rolls.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shaman makes one attack with its staff or two cosmic ray attacks.

action.name: Spirit Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) psychic damage.

action.name: Cosmic Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 8} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) radiant or necrotic damage.

action.name: Ancestral Spirits {@recharge 5}
entries: The shaman calls forth ancestral spirits in a 20-foot-radius sphere within 60 feet.

Each creature of the shaman's choice in that area must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant or necrotic damage and is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. On a successful save, the target takes half damage and isn't {@condition frightened}. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus.name: Cosmic Insight
entries: The shaman uses its connection to the cosmos to gain insight into the future, granting it advantage on its next attack roll, saving throw, or ability check until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Spiritual Deflection
entries: When the shaman is hit by an attack, it reduces the damage by 9 ({@dice 1d8 + 5}).

Each creature of the shaman's choice in that area must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the target takes half damage and isn't {@condition frightened}. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries: When the shaman is hit by an attack, it reduces the damage by 10 ({@dice 1d8 + 6}).

reaction.name: Cosmic Retaliation
entries: When the shaman takes damage from a creature within 30 feet of it makes a cosmic ray attack against the attacker.

monster.name: Supreme Cosmic Shaman

Additionally, the shaman enters a state of cosmic ascendancy for 1 hour, gaining advantage on all spell attack rolls and saving throws, and access to the options in the {@b Mythic Actions} section.

action.name: Celestial Spirits {@recharge 4}
entries: The shaman calls forth ancestral spirits in a 40-foot-radius sphere within 120 feet.

Each creature of the shaman's choice in that area must make a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) radiant or necrotic damage and is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. On a successful save, the target takes half damage and isn't {@condition frightened}. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus.name: Astral Insight
entries: The shaman uses its connection to the cosmos to gain insight into the future, granting it advantage on its next attack roll, saving throw, or ability check until the end of its next turn.
