entries: The shaman causes stars to fall in a 30-foot radius centered on a point it can see within 90 feet. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Charging Tackle
entries: If the hodag moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Terrifying Roar
entries: The hodag lets out a fearsome roar. Each creature within 30 feet of it that can hear must succeed on a {@dc 10} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

reaction.name: Unyielding
entries: The hodag halves the damage taken from an attack.

trait.name: Charging Tackle
entries: If the hodag moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) piercing damage and must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Forest Strider
entries: The hodag ignores difficult terrain in forest environments.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the hodag fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Primal Intuition
entries: The hodag has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks made for tracking and navigating in a forest environment.

trait.name: Spiked Carapace
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the hodag makes a melee attack against it and hits, the attacker takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage due to the hodag's sharp spines.

trait.name: Sturdy Stance
entries: The hodag has advantage on saving throws against being knocked {@condition prone} or pushed against its will.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hodag can use its Terrifying Roar and make two melee weapon attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or its gore.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d12 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Terrifying Roar
entries: The hodag lets out a fearsome roar. Each creature within 60 feet of it that can hear must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Creatures that have been {@condition frightened} by the hodag's Terrifying Roar have disadvantage on attack rolls for the next 24 hours, as the fear it instills lingers. This effect ends if the hodag dies.

reaction.name: Unyielding
entries: The hodag halves the damage taken from an attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The hodag moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Tail Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The hodag makes one tail attack.

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
entries: La Llorona can see 60 ft. into the Ethereal Plane while on The Material Plane, and vice versa.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: La Llorona can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. She takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

trait.name: Silent Apparition
entries: La Llorona moves silently, making no sound unless she wishes to be heard. She has advantage on {@skill Stealth} checks.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: La Llorona doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: La Llorona uses her Weeping Wail and then makes a withering touch.

action.name: Withering Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or have its hit point maximum reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken in this way. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Weeping Wail {@recharge 4}
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of La Llorona that can hear her must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. If the save fails by 5 or more, the target also ages {@dice 1d4 x 10} years.
A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the {@condition frightened} condition on itself on a success.

reaction.name: Soul Chains (1/Long Rest)
entries: When La Llorona is targeted by a spell or magical effect that deals damage, she gains an ethereal shield granting her resistance to all types of damage dealt by spells and magical effects until the start of her next turn.

trait.name: Forest Mirage
entries: The pukwudgie has advantage on Constitution saving throws to mantain {@status concentration}.

action.name: Poisoned Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Nature's Wrath {@recharge 5}
entries: The pukwudgie summons the forces of nature to assail its enemies. Each creature within a 10-foot radius of a point the pukwudgie chooses within 60 feet of it must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The damage type is chosen by the pukwudgie and can be either cold, lightning, or thunder.

bonus.name: Forest Veil
entries: The pukwudgie magically becomes {@condition invisible} until it attacks, casts a spell, or ends the invisibility as a bonus action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The pukwudgie's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Forest Mirage
entries: The pukwudgie has advantage on Constitution saving throws to mantain {@status concentration}.

trait.name: Mystic Ward
entries: The pukwudgie has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Magic Dart
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d4 + 4}) force damage.

action.name: Summon Forest Spirits (1/Day)
entries: The pukwudgie calls forth the spirits of the forest. Up to two spirits of the forest answer the call and appear in unoccupied spaces within 60 feet of the pukwudgie, acting as its allies. The spirits disappear when reduced to 0 hit points or when the pukwudgie dismisses them as a bonus action.

bonus.name: Forest Veil
entries: The pukwudgie magically becomes {@condition invisible} until it attacks, casts a spell, or ends the invisibility as a bonus action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The spirit of the forest's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Forest Camouflage
entries: The spirit of the forest has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made in forested terrain.

action.name: Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Forest's Aid (1/Day)
entries: The spirit of the forest targets one creature it can see within 30 feet. Vines emerge from the ground and heal the target, restoring 7 ({@dice 2d6}) hit points.

monster.name: Quetzalcoatl

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Quetzalcoatl's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 25}, {@hit 17} to hit with spell attacks).
He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Ancient Knowledge
entries: Quetzalcoatl has advantage on Intelligence ({@skill History}) and Intelligence ({@skill Religion}) checks.

trait.name: Blessing of the Sun
entries: Allies within 30 feet of Quetzalcoatl deal an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) radiant damage with their attacks.

trait.name: Dawn's Resurgence (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Quetzalcoatl would be reduced to 0 hit points, his current hit points instead resets to 345 and he recharges his Serpent Gaze. Additionally, Quetzalcoatl regains all expended uses of Legendary Resistance and can now use the options in the {@b Mythic Actions} section for 1 hour.
Award a party an additional 105,000 XP (210,000 XP total) for defeating Quetzalcoatl after his Dawn's Resurgence trait activates.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Quetzalcoatl fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Quetzalcoatl has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Quetzalcoatl's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Solar Affinity
entries: Any radiant damage dealt by Quetzalcoatl ignores resistance and treats immunity as resistance.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Quetzalcoatl makes three attacks: one with its beak and two with his talons.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d10 + 10}) slashing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) radiant damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d6 + 10}) slashing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Serpent Gaze {@recharge 5}
entries: Quetzalcoatl focuses its gaze on all creatures within a 120-foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 25} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

bonus.name: Healing Touch
entries: Quetzalcoatl touches an ally to heal them for 27 ({@dice 4d8 + 9}) hit points.

bonus.name: Radiant Surge
entries: Quetzalcoatl imbues his next melee attack with intense radiant energy, dealing an additional 13 ({@damage 3d8}) radiant damage on a hit.

legendary.name: Talon Attack
entries: Quetzalcoatl makes one talon attack.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Quetzalcoatl casts a spell with his Innate Spellcasting trait.

legendary.name: Serpent Gaze (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Quetzalcoatl uses his Serpent Gaze.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Quetzalcoatl teleports in an unoccupied space he can see within 120 feet.

mythicHeader: If Quetzalcoatl's Dawn's Resurgence trait has activated in the last hour, he can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Beak Attack
entries: Quetzalcoatl makes one beak attack.

mythic.name: Solar Flare
entries: Quetzalcoatl emits a burst of intense light. Each creature within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.

mythic.name: Radiant Scales (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Quetzalcoatl's scales shimmer with radiant energy, granting him a +2 bonus to AC until the start of his next turn. During this time, any creature that hits him with a melee attack takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage.

mythic.name: Divine Wind (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Quetzalcoatl exhales a gust of divine wind in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 25} Strength saving throw, taking 55 ({@damage 10d10}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The gust extinguishes unprotected flames and disperses gas or vapor in the area.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The skinwalker can mimic animal sounds and human voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The skinwalker regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Shapechange
entries: The skinwalker can use its bonus action to polymorph into an animal or a medium humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skinwalker makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite (Animal Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Mind Control {@recharge 5}
entries: The skinwalker targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} for 1 minute. The {@condition charmed} target obeys the skinwalker's verbal commands. If the target suffers any harm or receives a harmful command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus.name: Mystic Veil {@recharge 3}
entries: The skinwalker becomes {@condition invisible} until the start of its next turn or until it attacks.

bonus.name: Swift Retreat
entries: The skinwalker moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

reaction.name: Distracting Sound
entries: When a creature the skinwalker can see makes an attack, the skinwalker creates a disorienting sound, imposing disadvantage on the attack roll.

monster.name: Stone Coat Giant

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The stone coat giant is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the stone coat giant fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Mountain's Fortitude
entries: The stone coat giant has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition stunned}.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The stone coat giant deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Stone's Awakening (Recharges after Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the stone coat giant is reduced to or below 132 hit points, it regains all expended uses of Legendary Resistance, its AC increases by 2, and its rocky exterior begins to radiate an intense, freezing aura. Creatures that start their turn within a 15-foot radius centered on the stone coat giant for the duration take 10 (3d6) cold damage. Additionally, the stone coat giant can now use the options detailed in the {@b Mythic Actions} section.
Award a party an additional 4,000 XP (22,000 XP total) for defeating the stone coat giant after its Stone's Awakening trait activates.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The stone coat giant makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Boulder Throw
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 16} to hit, range 80/240 ft., one target. {@h}43 ({@damage 6d10 + 10}) bludgeoning damage. The boulder remains in the targeted area, providing half cover. The boulder has AC 15, 50 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.

action.name: Icy Boulder Throw
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 16} to hit, range 80/240 ft., one target. {@h}43 ({@damage 6d10 + 10}) bludgeoning damage. Creatures within a 10-foot radius of the point of impact must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking an additional 18 ({@damage 4d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The cold from the boulder creates a slick, icy surface in the affected area that lasts for 1 minute. The icy area is difficult terrain for every creature other than the stone coat giant, and creatures that enter the area or start their turn there must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}. The boulder remains in the targeted area, providing half cover. The icy boulder has AC 15, 50 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage. The stone coat giant can only use this attack while within icy, or frosty terrain.

action.name: Frosty Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The stone coat giant exhales a blast of freezing wind in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw, taking 55 ({@damage 10d10}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The stone coat giant can only use this ability while within icy, or frosty terrain.

reaction.name: Rocky Endurance
entries: When the stone coat giant takes damage, it reduces the damage by half.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The stone coat giant moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Slam Attack (Cost 2 Actions)
entries: The stone coat giant makes one slam attack.

legendary.name: Frost Breath (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The stone coat giant uses its Frost Breath.

mythicHeader: Once its Stone's Awakening trait is activated, the stone coat giant can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Frozen Ground
entries: The ground in a 40-foot radius around the stone coat giant becomes icy until the end of its next turn.
The affected area is difficult terrain for every creature other than the stone coat giant.

mythic.name: Chilling Slam (Cost 2 Actions)
entries: The stone coat giant makes one slam attack. If the attack hits, the target takes an additional 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold damage and has its speed reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

mythic.name: Rockslide (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The stone coat giant causes a cascade of boulders to roll down in a 60-foot long, 20-foot wide line in a direction it chooses. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw, taking 42 ({@damage 12d6}) bludgeoning damage and being knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or half as much damage and not being knocked {@condition prone} on a successful one.

monster.name: Supay

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Supay's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 24}, {@hit 16} to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Charming Aura
entries: Supay exudes a charming aura in a 120-foot radius. A creature that starts its turn in this aura must succeed on a {@dc 24} Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on attack rolls against Supay for 1 minute. An affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: Supay knows if he hears a lie.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Supay fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Lord of the Ukhu Pacha (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Supay would be reduced to 0 hit points, his current hit points instead resets to 225 and he regains 2 expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, Supay can now use the options in the {@b Mythic Actions} section for 1 hour.
Award a party an additional 50,000 XP (100,000 XP total) for defeating Supay after his Lord of the Ukhu Pacha trait activates.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Supay has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Supay can use his Frightful Presence. He then makes three attacks: one with his tail and two with his claws.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of Supay's choice within 120 feet of him and aware of him must succeed on a {@dc 24} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Supay's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Summon Devils {@recharge 5}
entries: Supay magically summons devils based on the result of a {@dice d100} roll. {@dice d100} Summoned Devils
These devils act on their own initiative and obey Supay's commands.

legendary.name: Devilish Strike
entries: Supay makes one melee weapon attack.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Supay teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary.name: Infernal Gaze (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Supay fixes his gaze on a creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must succeed on a {@dc 24} Wisdom saving throw or take 45 ({@damage 10d8}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

mythicHeader: If Supay's Lord of the Ukhu Pacha trait has activated in the last hour, he can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Supay's Embrace
entries: Supay chooses a creature within 60 feet. The target must make a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) necrotic damage and is {@condition restrained} by ethereal chains for 1 minute. A {@condition restrained} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

mythic.name: Soul Drain (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Supay targets a creature within 60 feet. The target must succeed on a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw or take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) necrotic damage, and Supay regains hit points equal to half the damage dealt. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage, and Supay doesn't regain hit points.

mythic.name: Hellfire Beam (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Supay unleashes a beam of hellish fire in a 120-foot line that is 30 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@dice 5d10}) fire damage and 27 ({@damage 5d10}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the teihiihan can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw, taking 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the teihiihan can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Skirmisher
entries: The teihiihan can move up to half its speed as a reaction when an enemy ends its turn within 5 feet of it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The teihiihan makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The teihiihan witch is a 5th-level spellcaster.
Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Invisibility
entries: The teihiihan witch can cast the {@spell invisibility} spell at will, without expending a spell slot or consuming material components.

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the teihiihan can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Indomitable Will
entries: The teihiihan war leader has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Relentless Endurance (1/Day)
entries: When the teihiihan war leader is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, it can choose to drop to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Skirmisher
entries: The teihiihan can move up to half its speed as a reaction when an enemy ends its turn within 5 feet of it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The teihiihan war leader makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: War Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Throwing Knife
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Battle Cry (2/Day)
entries: The teihiihan war leader lets out a powerful battlecry. Each creature of the teihiihan war leader's choice that is within 30 feet of it and can hear it gain advantage on attack rolls until the start of the war leader's next turn.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The teihiihan war leader adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the war leader must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The teihiihan battle shaman is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Invisibility
entries: The teihiihan witch can cast the {@spell invisibility} spell at will, without expending a spell slot or consuming material components.

trait.name: Nature's Blessing
entries: The teihiihan battle shaman can speak with animals as if they shared a language.

trait.name: Spirit-Touched
entries: The teihiihan battle shaman is in constant communion with the spirits, gaining advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The teihiihan battle shaman makes two melee attacks.

action.name: War Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

bonus.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
entries: The teihiihan battle shaman heals an ally it can touch for 13 ({@dice 2d8 + 4}) hit points.

reaction.name: Warding Flare (3/Day)
entries: When targeted by a creature within 30 feet that it can see, the teihiihan battle shaman imposes disadvantage on the attack roll, causing light to flare before the attacker.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The thunderbird has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Lightning Charge {@recharge 5}
entries: The thunderbird makes an attack with its beak, dealing an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage on a hit.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The thunderbird has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Storm Aura
entries: Creatures within 10 feet of the thunderbird have disadvantage on saving throws against being knocked {@condition prone} or pushed again their will.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thunderbird makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons. The thunderbird can replace a beak attack with its Lightning Charge.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Lightning Charge {@recharge 4}
entries: The thunderbird makes an attack with its beak, dealing an additional 21 ({@damage 6d6}) lightning damage on a hit.

action.name: Lightning Burst {@recharge 5}
entries: The thunderbird releases a burst of electrical energy. Creatures within a 30-foot radius must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Gust
entries: The thunderbird flaps its powerful wings, creating a gust of wind in a 60-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 15 feet away from the thunderbird.

reaction.name: Thunderous Rebuke
entries: When hit by a melee attack, the thunderbird emits a burst of thunderous sound. The attacker must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) thunder damage and be {@condition deafened} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The thunderbird has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the thunderbird fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Storm Aura
entries: Creatures within 30 feet of the thunderbird have disadvantage on saving throws against being knocked {@condition prone} or pushed again their will.

trait.name: Storm Lord
entries: The thunderbird can innately cast {@spell control weather} spell (without requiring material components and {@status concentration}) but can only create stormy weather with it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thunderbird makes three attacks: one with its beak and two with its talons. The thunderbird can replace a beak attack with its Lightning Charge.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Lightning Charge {@recharge 3}
entries: The thunderbird makes an attack with its beak, dealing an additional 35 ({@damage 10d6}) lightning damage on a hit.

action.name: Lightning Burst {@recharge 5}
entries: The thunderbird releases a burst of electrical energy. Creatures within a 30-foot radius must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 ({@damage 12d8}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Call Lightning (3/Day)
entries: The thunderbird summons a concentrated lightning bolt to strike at a location it can see within 100 feet. Creatures within 5 feet of that point must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Gust
entries: The thunderbird flaps its powerful wings, creating a gust of wind in a 60-foot line that is 20 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 15 feet away from the thunderbird.

reaction.name: Thunderous Rebuke
entries: When hit by a melee attack, the thunderbird emits a burst of thunderous sound. The attacker must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) thunder damage and be {@condition deafened} until the end of its next turn.

monster.name: Tzitzimitl

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Tzitzimitl's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 21}, {@hit 13} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Astral Presence
entries: Tzitzimitl can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Celestial Affinity
entries: Tzitzimitl has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects dealing radiant damage, originating from celestial beings, or related to the stars and the night sky.

trait.name: Celestial Alignment (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Tzitzimitl would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit points instead resets to 215, it recharges its Astral Scream, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. The sky darkens ominously, and Tzitzimitl emanates a menacing glow. Tzitzimitl can now use the options in the {@b Mythic Actions} section for 1 hour.
Award a party an additional 25,000 XP (50,000 XP total) for defeating Tzitzimitl after its Celestial Alignment trait activates.

trait.name: Eclipse's Call
entries: During a solar or lunar eclipse, Tzitzimitl's abilities recharge faster. All rechargeable abilities recharge at the start of each of its turns during an eclipse.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Tzitzimitl fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Nightborn
entries: Tzitzimitl gains a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws when fighting under a night sky.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Tzitzimitl makes three attacks with its slam or two with its scythe.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Reaping Scythe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d8 + 9}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and Tzitzimitl regains hit points equal to half that amount.
The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Astral Scream {@recharge 5}
entries: Tzitzimitl releases a terrifying scream. Each creature within 60 feet other than Tzitzimitl must make a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) psychic damage and being {@condition frightened} for 1 minute on a failed save, or half as much damage and not being {@condition frightened} on a successful one. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

reaction.name: Doom Foretold
entries: When a creature targets Tzitzimitl with an attack roll, Tzitzimitl imposes disadvantage on that roll.

legendary.name: Slam Attack
entries: Tzitzimitl makes one slam attack.

legendary.name: Astral Movement (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Tzitzimitl moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Astral Scream (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Tzitzimitl uses its Astral Scream.

mythicHeader: If Tzitzimitl's Celestial Alignment trait has activated in the last hour, it can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Reaping Scythe Attack
entries: Tzitzimitl makes one attack with its scythe.

mythic.name: Astral Teleportation (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Tzitzimitl disappears into the astral plane and reappears in an unoccupied space it can see within 120 feet.

mythic.name: Celestial Burst (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Tzitzimitl unleashes a burst of dark, celestial energy in a 60-foot radius centered on itself. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Nonmagical light sources in the area are extinguished, and the area is filled with magical darkness until the start of Tzitzimitl's next turn.

trait.name: Deadly Gaze
entries: Creatures that meet the Uktena's gaze are compelled to approach it unless they succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature uses its movement to approach the Uktena on each of its turns.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the Uktena until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the Uktena in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the Uktena fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Uktena makes three attacks: two with its bite and one with its coils.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Coils
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). While {@condition grappled} in this way, the target is also {@condition restrained}, and the Uktena can't use its coils attack against another creature.

action.name: Pestilential Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The Uktena exhales a magical, poisonous gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The Uktena makes one attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The Uktena moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Pestilential Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Uktena uses its Pestilential Breath.

trait.name: Ethereal Awareness
entries: The Wampus cat can see into the Ethereal Plane out to a range of 60 feet.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the Wampus cat fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The Wampus cat has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the Wampus cat can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Wampus cat makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its bite.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Haunting Howl
entries: The Wampus cat can unleash a supernatural howl. Each creature within 120 feet of the Wampus cat that can hear its howl must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus.name: Ethereal Shift
entries: The Wampus cat magically shifts from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane, or vice versa.

legendary.name: Claw Attack
entries: The Wampus cat makes one claw attack.

legendary.name: Terrifying Gaze (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Wampus cat fixes its gaze on one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or take 39 ({@damage 6d12}) psychic damage and be {@condition frightened} until the end of the creature's next turn.

monster.name: Wendigo
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The wendigo has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Insatiable Hunger
entries: The wendigo has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wendigo makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the wendigo's choice that is within 120 feet of the wendigo and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute.

monster.name: Xolotl

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Xolotl's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 25}, {@hit 17} to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Eternal Vigilance
entries: Xolotl cannot be surprised.

trait.name: Guidance of Souls
entries: Whenever an ally within 60 feet of Xolotl makes a saving throw, it can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the save.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If Xolotl fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Lightning of Destruction
entries: Any lightning damage dealt by Xolotl ignores lightning resistance and treats lightning immunity as lightning resistance.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Xolotl has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Master of Flames
entries: Any fire damage dealt by Xolotl ignores fire resistance and treats fire immunity as fire resistance.

trait.name: Twilight's Emissary (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Xolotl would be reduced to 0 hit points, his current hit points instead resets to 305 and it recharges its Souls Steal. Additionally, Xolotl can now use the options in the {@b Mythic Actions} section for 1 hour.
Award a party an additional 90,000 XP (180,000 XP total) for defeating Xolotl after his Twilight's Emissary trait activates.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Xolotl makes three attacks with his whips.

action.name: Flame Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}31 ({@dice 4d10 + 9}) fire damage.

action.name: Lightning Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}31 ({@damage 4d10 + 9}) lightning damage.

action.name: Soul Steal {@recharge 4}
entries: Xolotl reaches into a creature's chest within 20 feet of itself and grabs its soul. The target must make a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw, taking 130 ({@damage 20d12}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Twilight Shield
entries: Xolotl adds 5 to its AC against one attack that would hit it. If the attack misses, the attacker takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) fire damage and 5 ({@damage 1d10}) lightning damage if it is within 15 feet of Xolotl.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Xolotl moves up to half his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Whip Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Xolotl makes one whip attack.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Xolotl casts a spell with his Innate Spellcasting trait.

legendary.name: Soul Steal (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Xolotl uses his Soul Steal.

mythicHeader: If Xolotl's Twilight's Emissary trait has activated in the last hour, he can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Ethereal Chain
entries: Xolotl sends forth a chain that can pass through obstacles to grasp at a creature's soul within 60 feet. The target must succeed on a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw or take 35 ({@damage 10d6}) necrotic damage and be {@condition restrained} for 1 minute. A {@condition restrained} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

mythic.name: Twilight Veil (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Xolotl casts a veil of twilight in a 30-foot radius centered on himself. The area is heavily obscured until the end of his next turn.

mythic.name: Soul Rend (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Xolotl uses his Soul Steal. If the target fails the saving throw, it also suffers a level of {@condition exhaustion}.

trait.name: Aquatic Camouflage
entries: Yacumama has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made while submerged in water.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: Yacumama can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Slippery Scales
entries: While partially submerged in water, Yacumama's slippery body makes it difficult to land attacks.
Attackers have disadvantage on their first attack roll against it each turn.

trait.name: Water Agility
entries: Yacumama has advantage on Dexterity saving throws while partially submerged in water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Yacumama makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}31 ({@damage 4d10 + 9}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Water Jet {@recharge 5}
entries: Yacumama exhales a blast of water in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) bludgeoning damage and being knocked {@condition prone} and pushed up to 20 feet away from Yacumama on a failed save, or taking half as much damage and not being pushed or knocked {@condition prone} on a successful one.

trait.name: Ancient Presence
entries: Creatures within 60 feet of Sachamama have disadvantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If Sachamama fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Rooted to the Earth
entries: Sachamama can't be knocked {@condition prone}, and it has advantage on saving throws and ability checks against being pushed against its will.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: Sachamama deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Tight Coils
entries: Once per turn, Sachamama has advantage on its constrict attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Sachamama makes two attacks with its bite or two with its constrict.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}36 ({@damage 4d12 + 10}) piercing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and Sachamama can't constrict another target.

reaction.name: Defensive Curl
entries: When targeted by an attack, Sachamama increases its AC by +7 against that attack.

reaction.name: Snap Back
entries: When missed by a melee attack, Sachamama makes one bite attack against the attacker.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Sachamama moves up to half its speed withut provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Sachamama makes one attack.

legendary.name: Invoke Terror (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Each creature of Sachamama's choice within 120 feet of it and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The yacuruna's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The yacuruna can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The yacuruna can use its action to polymorph into a creature of Medium size it has seen before, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The yacuruna's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The yacuruna can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The yacuruna can use its action to polymorph into a Medium creature it has seen before, or back into its true form. Its statistics, except for its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Net {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 15/30 ft., one creature. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained} by the net until it is freed. A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 10} Strength check, freeing itself or another creature within its reach on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 10) also frees the creature without harming it, ending the effect and destroying the net.

reaction.name: Whirlpool Escape
entries: When the yacuruna takes damage from a creature that is within 5 feet of it, it creates a small whirlpool around itself. The yacuruna immediately moves up to its swimming speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The yacuruna's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The yacuruna can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Aquatic Camouflage
entries: While in water, the yacuruna can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The yacuruna can use its action to polymorph into a Medium or Small creature it has seen before, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except its size. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Net {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 15/30 ft., one creature. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained} by the net until it is freed. A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 10} Strength check, freeing itself or another creature within its reach on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 10) also frees the creature without harming it, ending the effect and destroying the net.

reaction.name: Whirlpool Escape
entries: When the yacuruna takes damage from a creature that is within 5 feet of it, it creates a small whirlpool around itself. The yacuruna immediately moves up to its swimming speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The yacuruna's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The yacuruna can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Aquatic Camouflage
entries: While in water, the yacuruna can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The yacuruna can use its action to polymorph into a Medium or Small creature it has seen before, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for its size. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The yacuruna elite makes three attacks with its trident.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Net {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 15/30 ft., one creature. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained} by the net until it is freed. A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 14} Strength check, freeing itself or another creature within its reach on a success. Dealing 8 slashing damage to the net (AC 10) also frees the creature without harming it, ending the effect and destroying the net.

reaction.name: Whirlpool Escape
entries: When the yacuruna takes damage from a creature that is within 5 feet of it, it creates a small whirlpool around itself. The yacuruna immediately moves up to its swimming speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The yacuruna's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The yacuruna can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The yacuruna can use its action to polymorph into any creature of Medium or Small size it has seen before, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for its size. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The yacuruna makes three attacks with its trident.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage, or 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Net {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one creature. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained} by the net until it is freed. A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 16} Strength check, freeing itself or another creature within its reach on a success. Dealing 10 slashing damage to the net (AC 10) also frees the creature without harming it, ending the effect and destroying the net.

bonus.name: Watery Surge
entries: The yacuruna channels the elemental power of water, infusing its next melee weapon attack with aquatic force. The chieftain deals an additional 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage on a hit.

reaction.name: Command the Depths
entries: When a creature the yacuruna can see makes a melee attack against it, the yacuruna summons a geyser of water, forcing the attacker to make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet and be knocked {@condition prone}.

monster.name: Anubis

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Anubis' spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 26}, {@hit 18} to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Aura of Judgement
entries: Each creature of Anubis' choice that starts its turn within 30 feet of him must make a {@dc 26} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: Anubis knows if he hears a lie.

trait.name: Duat Overlord (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When Anubis is reduced to 0 hit points, his current hit points instead reset to 265, he recharges his Divine Command and Soul Gaze abilites, he regains 2 expended uses of Legendary Resistance, and he enters a state of divine ascendancy for 1 hour. In this state, his movement speed doubles, his weapon attacks deal an extra 18 (4d8) force damage, and he can use the options in the {@b Mythic Actions} section.
Award a party an additional 120,000 XP (240,000 XP total) for defeating Anubis after his Duat Overlord trait activates.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Anubis fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Judgment of the Dead
entries: Anubis can perform a 10-minute ritual that judges the soul of a deceased creature he touches. If the creature's soul is deemed worthy, it is transported to the afterlife. If not, the soul is destroyed.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Anubis regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Anubis uses either his Divine Command or Soul Gaze ability and then makes two attacks with his staff.

action.name: Ankh Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) radiant damage and 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Divine Command {@recharge 4}
entries: Anubis issues a command that is magically compelling. A creature of Anubis's choice that he can see within 120 feet of him and that can hear him must succeed on a {@dc 26} Wisdom saving throw or follow his command on its next turn as per the {@spell command} spell.

action.name: Soul Gaze {@recharge 4}
entries: Anubis targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must make a {@dc 26} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

reaction.name: Judge's Retribution
entries: When hit by a melee attack, Anubis unleashes a burst of divine energy. The attacker must make a {@dc 26} Constitution saving throw, taking 11 ({@damage 2d10}) radiant damage and 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage and being pushed up to 20 feet away from Anubis on a failed save, or taking half damage and not being pushed on a successful one.

legendary.name: Ankh Staff Attack
entries: Anubis makes one staff attack.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Anubis magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary.name: Soul Reaping (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Anubis targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must make a {@dc 26} Constitution saving throw, taking 55 ({@damage 10d10}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If this damage reduces a creature to 0 hit points, Anubis destroys its soul, which can only be restored to life by a wish or {@spell true resurrection} spell.

mythicHeader: If Anubis' Duat Overlord trait has activated in the last hour, he can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic.name: Ethereal Strike
entries: Anubis makes one attack with his Ankh Staff.
This attack is made with advantage, overriding any other effects that would give disadvantage. Additionally, the {@spell shield} spell provides no bonus against this attack.

mythic.name: Judgment (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Anubis targets one creature he can see within 120 feet of him. The target must succeed on a {@dc 26} Wisdom saving throw or take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

mythic.name: Wrath of the Underworld (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Anubis channels the power of the underworld in a 60-foot radius around himself. Each creature in this area must make a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 27 ({@damage 5d10}) radiant damage and 27 ({@damage 5d10}) necrotic damage, and is {@condition blinded} and {@condition deafened} for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half the damage and is not {@condition blinded} or {@condition deafened}. A creature affected by the blindness and deafness can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effects on itself on a success.

trait.name: Anubis Blessing
entries: The Anubis jackal has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Additionally, the jackal regenerates 5 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point. If the Anubis jackal takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the jackal's next turn.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The Anubis jackal has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The Anubis jackal has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the jackal's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Anubis jackal makes one attack with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Terrifying Howl {@recharge 5}
entries: The Anubis jackal lets out a fearsome howl. Each creature that can hear within 30 feet of the jackal must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the jackal is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Desert Camouflage
entries: The anubite sentinel has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in desert terrains.

trait.name: Guardian of the Dead
entries: The anubite sentinel has advantage on attack rolls against undead creatures. Its weapon attacks are magical and deal additional necrotic damage on a hit.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The anubite priest is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). The anubite priest has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Guardian of the Dead
entries: The anubite priest has advantage on attack rolls against undead creatures. Its weapon attacks are magical and deal additional radiant damage on a hit.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The anubite priests make two attacks with its mace. Alternatively, the priest makes one attack with its mace and cast one spell with its Spellcasting trait.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage.

trait.name: Guardian of the Dead
entries: The anubite embalmer has advantage on attack rolls against undead creatures. Its weapon attacks are magical and deal additional necrotic damage on a hit.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The anubite embalmer makes one attack with its embalming tools and then uses its Mummify.

action.name: Embalming Tools
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. A creature {@condition poisoned} in this way is also {@condition paralyzed} for the duration. A {@condition poisoned} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Mummify {@recharge 4}
entries: The anubite embalmer targets one {@condition paralyzed} creature within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The anubite oracle is a 10th-level spellcaster.
Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). The anubite oracle has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Anubis Blessing
entries: The anubite oracle regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point. Additionally, it has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Guardian of the Dead
entries: The anubite oracle has advantage on attack rolls against undead creatures. Its weapon attacks are magical and deal additional radiant damage on a hit.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The anubite oracle makes two attacks with its staff. It can replace one attack with its Prophecy of Doom or to cast a spell with its Spellcasting trait.

action.name: Staff of the Ages
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Prophecy of Doom {@recharge 5}
entries: The anubite oracle targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or receive a dire prophecy, suffering disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws for 1 minute. The target can make another Wisdom saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

reaction.name: Shift Fate
entries: After an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw is made within 60 feet of the anubite oracle, the oracle forces a reroll.

trait.name: Anubis Blessing
entries: The anubite warlord regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point. Additionally, it has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Guardian of the Dead
entries: The anubite warlord has advantage on attack rolls against undead creatures. Its weapon attacks are magical and deal additional necrotic damage on a hit.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The anubite warlord makes three attacks with its war spear.

action.name: War Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d12 + 6}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Sands of the Desert {@recharge 5}
entries: The anubite warlord magically summons a sandstorm in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point it can see within 60 feet. The area becomes heavily obscured, and each creature in it at the start of its turn must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The storm lasts for 1 minute or until the anubite warlord loses {@status concentration} (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell).

bonus.name: Command Ally
entries: The anubite warlord issues a command to one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. The target can use its reaction to make one weapon attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The anubite warlord moves up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: War Spear Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The anubite warlord makes one attack with its war spear.

legendary.name: Sandstorm (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The anubite warlord uses its Sands of the Desert.

legendary.name: Spellcasting (Costs 3 Actions)

trait.name: Desert Survivalist
entries: The Egyptian nomad leader has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks made in desert environments.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Composite Bow

entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Pharaoh's Shield
entries: When the Medjay guard is within 5 feet of the Pharaoh and the Pharaoh takes damage from an attack targeting only it, the guard intercepts the attack, taking the damage instead of the Pharaoh.

trait.name: Vigilant
entries: The Medjay captain has advantage on Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) and Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks.

action.name: Multiattack

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
